idea-plugin.name: Upsource Integration
idea-plugin.description:
Integration with JetBrains Upsource

Note: If you want to have access to the most recent bug fixes and features of the plugin, you can install it from the alpha channel. To do so please add the following custom plugin repository: https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugins/alpha/7431
idea-plugin.change-notes:
• EA-451211 Fix NPE while getting color for builds info tooltip.

2020.1.1987

  • UP-10976 EA-454318 Suppress java.lang.StackOverflowError while connecting in IDEA 2022.1.

2020.1.1983

  • Make compatible with IDEA 2022.1 EAP 2.

2020.1.1981

  • Drop compatibility with IDEA 2019.* and 2020.1.
  • Add compatibility with IDEA 2022.1+.

2020.1.1947

  • UP-10952 Fix focus problem while adding/editing comment from editor.

2020.1.1938

  • EA-393639 Get rid of usages of com.intellij.openapi.util.Disposer.isDisposing that will be removed soon.

2020.1.1935

  • Get rid of usages of com.intellij.vcs.log.ui.frame.CommitPanel removed in IDEA 2021.3.

2020.1.1924

  • UP-10917 Fix comments encoding.
  • UP-10919 Get rid of usages of com.intellij.util.SystemProperties.getLineSeparator that will be removed in IDEA 2022.1.

2020.1.1897

  • Get rid of usages of com.intellij.xml.util.XmlTagUtilBase removed in IDEA 2021.2.

2020.1.1894

  • UP-10615 Preserve line breaks in commit messages.

2020.1.1886

  • Get rid of usages of com.intellij.reference.SoftReference.deref removed in IDEA 2021.2.

2020.1.1865

  • EA-249143 Do not request resource from classloader using path with leading slash.

2020.1.1832

  • UP-10790 Fix rendering comments via JCEF when scale factor is fractional.
  • UP-10764 Fix discussion details popup positioning when switching mode in markdown editor.

2020.1.1826

  • UP-10817 Set normal window level for component popups.

2020.1.1822

  • UP-10780 Add ability to resize discussion details popup.

2020.1.1819

  • UP-10811 Fix charset for comments rendered via JCEF when Java charset differs from OS default locale.
  • Fix notification popup window level.

2020.1.1812

  • Use heavyweight popup to show notification and discussion in editor due to JCEF requirements.

2020.1.1803

  • EA-236480 Fix NPE while reset connection settings.

2020.1.1790

  • UP-10765 Do not use com.intellij.util.Alarm.ThreadToUse.OWN_THREAD.
  • EA-217889 Prevent cyclic service initialization.
  • EA-231486 Suppress integration for default project.
  • EA-215772 Do not process notification when project is disposed.

2020.1.1769

  • UP-10664 Add ability to render comments via JCEF for IDEA 2020.2+.

2019.1.1698

  • EA-231488 Add compatibility with IDEA 2020.2+.

2019.1.1674

  • Drop compatibility with IDEA 2018.*.
  • Customize actions at proper moment for IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1632

  • UP-10625 Fix problems with unified diff.

2019.1.1626

  • UP-10618 Fix some assertions appeared due to changes in IDEA 2020.1.

2019.1.1616

  • Add compatibility with IDEA 2020.1+.

2019.1.1579

  • EA-219744 Fix NPE while handle change list changes.

2019.1.1577

  • UP-10577 Make compatible with Android Studio 4.0.

2019.1.1571

  • UP-10575 Make lower since-version for IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1560

  • UP-10562 Change "Accept changes" and "Raise concern" icons to correspond web interface ones.
  • UP-10552 Make "Pick a reaction" icon paler.

2019.1.1554

  • UP-8903 Show tooltip for "Message" column in review details.

2019.1.1537

  • UP-10510 Extract Java-specific part into optional plugin descriptor for IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1518

  • UP-10511 Remove usages of deprecated methods of com.intellij.util.containers.ContainerUtil.
  • UP-10506 Do not shorten names in feed.

2019.1.1506

  • Add compatibility with IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1501

  • UP-10484 Use different icons for "Show Diff" and "Compare with Local" actions.
  • EA-212321 Do not check if notification viewed when project is disposed.

2019.1.1473

  • UP-10461 Fix NoSuchMethodException while view local changes in unified diff.

2019.1.1467

  • EA-210139 Do not request application service com.intellij.ui.EditorTextFieldProvider as project service.
  • EA-137287 Do not commit discussions when project is disposed.
  • EA-142693 Do not update comment editor when project is disposed.
  • EA-209888 Do not register initializing routine when project is disposed.

2019.1.1437

  • Drop compatibility with IDEA 2017.*.
  • UP-10405 Add ability to not suggest review while commit.

2019.1.1423

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • UP-10391 Fix painting for file comments.

2019.1.1386

  • Remove usages of deprecated com.intellij.openapi.vcs.changes.ui.CommitChangeListDialog.getAffectedVcses.
  • Add plugin icon for IDEA 2019.1+.

2019.1.1362

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • EA-140913 Do not navigate to local file when text range is wrong.
  • UP-10346 Remove usages of deprecated VCS log filters constructors.

2019.1.1238

  • UP-10288 Add ability to open revision in Upsource from annotation's context menu.

2019.1.1226

  • UP-10299 Limit threads count from application pool that might be used.

2019.1.1194

  • EA-133845 Fix painting avatars for IDEA 2017.3.
  • Use SVG emoji icons for IDEA 2018.2+.
  • EA-133613 Fix NPE while navigate to Git log.

2019.1.1182

  • UP-9743 Provide links to review and revision in discussion header in feed when it is possible.
  • UP-10260 Add support for JBR11.
  • Fix rendering of build status column for IDEA 2019.1.

2018.2.1164

  • UP-9831 Use Platform UI to show revision details.

2018.2.1145

  • EA-133270 Do not schedule update of progress icon in feed when alarm is disposed.
  • UP-10205 Fix notification popup size.

2018.2.984

  • UP-9792 Bundle series of newly commented-out lines as one change in diff viewer.
  • EA-132803 Do not update discussions UI inside write action.
  • Add separators around modification actions in context menu of Reviews list.

2018.2.871

  • UP-9774 Fix tooltip text of inspection markers.
  • EA-131002 Catch and handle exception when there is no available port to listen to third-party authorization token.
  • EA-131138 Check text range more precisely on converting.
  • Get rid of dependency on deprecated class com.intellij.openapi.diff.impl.processing.ByWord.

2018.2.783

  • UP-10120 Fix drawing of avatars when fractional scale factor is set on Windows.
  • EA-129060 Do not show user chooser popup inside write action.
  • UP-10075 Take comment text height into account when resizing the text field.

2018.1.730

  • UP-10081 Preserve comment when an error occurs while trying to leave a comment in the editor.
  • EA-128421 Do not open diff when project is disposed.
  • EA-128811 Iterate over immutable list.

2018.1.701

  • Do not fail when an error occurs during JavaFX initialization.

2018.1.653

  • UP-9873 Fix layout of "Leave a Comment" popup.
  • UP-9440 Do not fully shrink comment input field on "Leave a Comment" popup.

2018.1.629

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget
  • UP-10058 Add mnemonic Alt-V to "Review with Upsource" checkbox in commit dialog.
  • UP-10022 Do not hide connection errors.
  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.

  • EA-219744 Fix NPE while handle change list changes.

2019.1.1577

  • UP-10577 Make compatible with Android Studio 4.0.

2019.1.1571

  • UP-10575 Make lower since-version for IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1560

  • UP-10562 Change "Accept changes" and "Raise concern" icons to correspond web interface ones.
  • UP-10552 Make "Pick a reaction" icon paler.

2019.1.1554

  • UP-8903 Show tooltip for "Message" column in review details.

2019.1.1537

  • UP-10510 Extract Java-specific part into optional plugin descriptor for IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1518

  • UP-10511 Remove usages of deprecated methods of com.intellij.util.containers.ContainerUtil.
  • UP-10506 Do not shorten names in feed.

2019.1.1506

  • Add compatibility with IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1501

  • UP-10484 Use different icons for "Show Diff" and "Compare with Local" actions.
  • EA-212321 Do not check if notification viewed when project is disposed.

2019.1.1473

  • UP-10461 Fix NoSuchMethodException while view local changes in unified diff.

2019.1.1467

  • EA-210139 Do not request application service com.intellij.ui.EditorTextFieldProvider as project service.
  • EA-137287 Do not commit discussions when project is disposed.
  • EA-142693 Do not update comment editor when project is disposed.
  • EA-209888 Do not register initializing routine when project is disposed.

2019.1.1437

  • Drop compatibility with IDEA 2017.*.
  • UP-10405 Add ability to not suggest review while commit.

2019.1.1423

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • UP-10391 Fix painting for file comments.

2019.1.1386

  • Remove usages of deprecated com.intellij.openapi.vcs.changes.ui.CommitChangeListDialog.getAffectedVcses.
  • Add plugin icon for IDEA 2019.1+.

2019.1.1362

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • EA-140913 Do not navigate to local file when text range is wrong.
  • UP-10346 Remove usages of deprecated VCS log filters constructors.

2019.1.1238

  • UP-10288 Add ability to open revision in Upsource from annotation's context menu.

2019.1.1226

  • UP-10299 Limit threads count from application pool that might be used.

2019.1.1194

  • EA-133845 Fix painting avatars for IDEA 2017.3.
  • Use SVG emoji icons for IDEA 2018.2+.
  • EA-133613 Fix NPE while navigate to Git log.

2019.1.1182

  • UP-9743 Provide links to review and revision in discussion header in feed when it is possible.
  • UP-10260 Add support for JBR11.
  • Fix rendering of build status column for IDEA 2019.1.

2018.2.1164

  • UP-9831 Use Platform UI to show revision details.

2018.2.1145

  • EA-133270 Do not schedule update of progress icon in feed when alarm is disposed.
  • UP-10205 Fix notification popup size.

2018.2.984

  • UP-9792 Bundle series of newly commented-out lines as one change in diff viewer.
  • EA-132803 Do not update discussions UI inside write action.
  • Add separators around modification actions in context menu of Reviews list.

2018.2.871

  • UP-9774 Fix tooltip text of inspection markers.
  • EA-131002 Catch and handle exception when there is no available port to listen to third-party authorization token.
  • EA-131138 Check text range more precisely on converting.
  • Get rid of dependency on deprecated class com.intellij.openapi.diff.impl.processing.ByWord.

2018.2.783

  • UP-10120 Fix drawing of avatars when fractional scale factor is set on Windows.
  • EA-129060 Do not show user chooser popup inside write action.
  • UP-10075 Take comment text height into account when resizing the text field.

2018.1.730

  • UP-10081 Preserve comment when an error occurs while trying to leave a comment in the editor.
  • EA-128421 Do not open diff when project is disposed.
  • EA-128811 Iterate over immutable list.

2018.1.701

  • Do not fail when an error occurs during JavaFX initialization.

2018.1.653

  • UP-9873 Fix layout of "Leave a Comment" popup.
  • UP-9440 Do not fully shrink comment input field on "Leave a Comment" popup.

2018.1.629

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget
  • UP-10058 Add mnemonic Alt-V to "Review with Upsource" checkbox in commit dialog.
  • UP-10022 Do not hide connection errors.
  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.

idea-plugin.name: Upsource Integration
idea-plugin.description:
Integration with JetBrains Upsource

Note: If you want to have access to the most recent bug fixes and features of the plugin, you can install it from the alpha channel. To do so please add the following custom plugin repository: https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugins/alpha/7431

2018.2.783

  • UP-10120 Fix drawing of avatars when fractional scale factor is set on Windows.
  • EA-129060 Do not show user chooser popup inside write action.
  • UP-10075 Take comment text height into account when resizing the text field.

2018.1.730

  • UP-10081 Preserve comment when an error occurs while trying to leave a comment in the editor.
  • EA-128421 Do not open diff when project is disposed.
  • EA-128811 Iterate over immutable list.

2018.1.701

  • Do not fail when an error occurs during JavaFX initialization.

2018.1.653

  • UP-9873 Fix layout of "Leave a Comment" popup.
  • UP-9440 Do not fully shrink comment input field on "Leave a Comment" popup.

2018.1.629

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget
  • UP-10058 Add mnemonic Alt-V to "Review with Upsource" checkbox in commit dialog.
  • UP-10022 Do not hide connection errors.
  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.

  • UP-10625 Fix problems with unified diff.

  • UP-10618 Fix some assertions appeared due to changes in IDEA 2020.1.

2019.1.1616

  • Add compatibility with IDEA 2020.1+.

2019.1.1579

  • EA-219744 Fix NPE while handle change list changes.

2019.1.1577

  • UP-10577 Make compatible with Android Studio 4.0.

2019.1.1571

  • UP-10575 Make lower since-version for IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1560

  • UP-10562 Change "Accept changes" and "Raise concern" icons to correspond web interface ones.
  • UP-10552 Make "Pick a reaction" icon paler.

2019.1.1554

  • UP-8903 Show tooltip for "Message" column in review details.

2019.1.1537

  • UP-10510 Extract Java-specific part into optional plugin descriptor for IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1518

  • UP-10511 Remove usages of deprecated methods of com.intellij.util.containers.ContainerUtil.
  • UP-10506 Do not shorten names in feed.

2019.1.1506

  • Add compatibility with IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1501

  • UP-10484 Use different icons for "Show Diff" and "Compare with Local" actions.
  • EA-212321 Do not check if notification viewed when project is disposed.

2019.1.1473

  • UP-10461 Fix NoSuchMethodException while view local changes in unified diff.

2019.1.1467

  • EA-210139 Do not request application service com.intellij.ui.EditorTextFieldProvider as project service.
  • EA-137287 Do not commit discussions when project is disposed.
  • EA-142693 Do not update comment editor when project is disposed.
  • EA-209888 Do not register initializing routine when project is disposed.

2019.1.1437

  • Drop compatibility with IDEA 2017.*.
  • UP-10405 Add ability to not suggest review while commit.

2019.1.1423

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • UP-10391 Fix painting for file comments.

2019.1.1386

  • Remove usages of deprecated com.intellij.openapi.vcs.changes.ui.CommitChangeListDialog.getAffectedVcses.
  • Add plugin icon for IDEA 2019.1+.

2019.1.1362

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • EA-140913 Do not navigate to local file when text range is wrong.
  • UP-10346 Remove usages of deprecated VCS log filters constructors.

2019.1.1238

  • UP-10288 Add ability to open revision in Upsource from annotation's context menu.

2019.1.1226

  • UP-10299 Limit threads count from application pool that might be used.

2019.1.1194

  • EA-133845 Fix painting avatars for IDEA 2017.3.
  • Use SVG emoji icons for IDEA 2018.2+.
  • EA-133613 Fix NPE while navigate to Git log.

2019.1.1182

  • UP-9743 Provide links to review and revision in discussion header in feed when it is possible.
  • UP-10260 Add support for JBR11.
  • Fix rendering of build status column for IDEA 2019.1.

2018.2.1164

  • UP-9831 Use Platform UI to show revision details.

2018.2.1145

  • EA-133270 Do not schedule update of progress icon in feed when alarm is disposed.
  • UP-10205 Fix notification popup size.

2018.2.984

  • UP-9792 Bundle series of newly commented-out lines as one change in diff viewer.
  • EA-132803 Do not update discussions UI inside write action.
  • Add separators around modification actions in context menu of Reviews list.

2018.2.871

  • UP-9774 Fix tooltip text of inspection markers.
  • EA-131002 Catch and handle exception when there is no available port to listen to third-party authorization token.
  • EA-131138 Check text range more precisely on converting.
  • Get rid of dependency on deprecated class com.intellij.openapi.diff.impl.processing.ByWord.

2018.2.783

  • UP-10120 Fix drawing of avatars when fractional scale factor is set on Windows.
  • EA-129060 Do not show user chooser popup inside write action.
  • UP-10075 Take comment text height into account when resizing the text field.

2018.1.730

  • UP-10081 Preserve comment when an error occurs while trying to leave a comment in the editor.
  • EA-128421 Do not open diff when project is disposed.
  • EA-128811 Iterate over immutable list.

2018.1.701

  • Do not fail when an error occurs during JavaFX initialization.

2018.1.653

  • UP-9873 Fix layout of "Leave a Comment" popup.
  • UP-9440 Do not fully shrink comment input field on "Leave a Comment" popup.

2018.1.629

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget
  • UP-10058 Add mnemonic Alt-V to "Review with Upsource" checkbox in commit dialog.
  • UP-10022 Do not hide connection errors.
  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.

  • UP-10075 Take comment text height into account when resizing the text field.

2018.1.730

  • UP-10081 Preserve comment when an error occurs while trying to leave a comment in the editor.
  • EA-128421 Do not open diff when project is disposed.
  • EA-128811 Iterate over immutable list.

2018.1.701

  • Do not fail when an error occurs during JavaFX initialization.

2018.1.653

  • UP-9873 Fix layout of "Leave a Comment" popup.
  • UP-9440 Do not fully shrink comment input field on "Leave a Comment" popup.

2018.1.629

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget
  • UP-10058 Add mnemonic Alt-V to "Review with Upsource" checkbox in commit dialog.
  • UP-10022 Do not hide connection errors.
  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.

• UP-10952 Fix focus problem while adding/editing comment from editor.

  • EA-393639 Get rid of usages of com.intellij.openapi.util.Disposer.isDisposing that will be removed soon.

2020.1.1894

2020.1.1886

2020.1.1865

  • EA-249143 Do not request resource from classloader using path with leading slash.

2020.1.1832

  • UP-10790 Fix rendering comments via JCEF when scale factor is fractional.
  • UP-10764 Fix discussion details popup positioning when switching mode in markdown editor.

2020.1.1826

  • UP-10817 Set normal window level for component popups.

2020.1.1822

  • UP-10780 Add ability to resize discussion details popup.

2020.1.1819

  • UP-10811 Fix charset for comments rendered via JCEF when Java charset differs from OS default locale.
  • Fix notification popup window level.

2020.1.1812

2020.1.1803

  • EA-236480 Fix NPE while reset connection settings.

2020.1.1790

  • UP-10625 Fix problems with unified diff.

  • Add compatibility with IDEA 2020.1+.

  • Add compatibility with IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1501

  • UP-10484 Use different icons for "Show Diff" and "Compare with Local" actions.
  • EA-212321 Do not check if notification viewed when project is disposed.

2019.1.1473

  • UP-10461 Fix NoSuchMethodException while view local changes in unified diff.

2019.1.1467

  • EA-210139 Do not request application service com.intellij.ui.EditorTextFieldProvider as project service.

  • EA-209888 Do not register initializing routine when project is disposed.

2019.1.1437

  • Drop compatibility with IDEA 2017.*.
  • UP-10405 Add ability to not suggest review while commit.

2019.1.1423

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.

2019.1.1386

  • Remove usages of deprecated com.intellij.openapi.vcs.changes.ui.CommitChangeListDialog.getAffectedVcses.

2019.1.1362

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.

2019.1.1238

  • UP-10288 Add ability to open revision in Upsource from annotation's context menu.

2019.1.1226

  • UP-10299 Limit threads count from application pool that might be used.

2019.1.1194

  • Use SVG emoji icons for IDEA 2018.2+.

2019.1.1182

2018.2.1164

  • UP-10511 Remove usages of deprecated methods of com.intellij.util.containers.ContainerUtil.
  • UP-10506 Do not shorten names in feed.

2019.1.1506

  • Add compatibility with IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1501

  • UP-10484 Use different icons for "Show Diff" and "Compare with Local" actions.
  • EA-212321 Do not check if notification viewed when project is disposed.

2019.1.1473

  • UP-10461 Fix NoSuchMethodException while view local changes in unified diff.

2019.1.1467

  • EA-210139 Do not request application service com.intellij.ui.EditorTextFieldProvider as project service.
  • EA-137287 Do not commit discussions when project is disposed.
  • EA-142693 Do not update comment editor when project is disposed.
  • EA-209888 Do not register initializing routine when project is disposed.

2019.1.1437

  • Drop compatibility with IDEA 2017.*.
  • UP-10405 Add ability to not suggest review while commit.

2019.1.1423

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • UP-10391 Fix painting for file comments.

2019.1.1386

  • Remove usages of deprecated com.intellij.openapi.vcs.changes.ui.CommitChangeListDialog.getAffectedVcses.
  • Add plugin icon for IDEA 2019.1+.

2019.1.1362

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • EA-140913 Do not navigate to local file when text range is wrong.
  • UP-10346 Remove usages of deprecated VCS log filters constructors.

2019.1.1238

  • UP-10288 Add ability to open revision in Upsource from annotation's context menu.

2019.1.1226

  • UP-10299 Limit threads count from application pool that might be used.

2019.1.1194

  • EA-133845 Fix painting avatars for IDEA 2017.3.
  • Use SVG emoji icons for IDEA 2018.2+.
  • EA-133613 Fix NPE while navigate to Git log.

2019.1.1182

  • UP-9743 Provide links to review and revision in discussion header in feed when it is possible.
  • UP-10260 Add support for JBR11.
  • Fix rendering of build status column for IDEA 2019.1.

2018.2.1164

  • UP-9831 Use Platform UI to show revision details.

2018.2.1145

  • EA-133270 Do not schedule update of progress icon in feed when alarm is disposed.
  • UP-10205 Fix notification popup size.

2018.2.984

  • UP-9792 Bundle series of newly commented-out lines as one change in diff viewer.
  • EA-132803 Do not update discussions UI inside write action.
  • Add separators around modification actions in context menu of Reviews list.

2018.2.871

  • UP-9774 Fix tooltip text of inspection markers.
  • EA-131002 Catch and handle exception when there is no available port to listen to third-party authorization token.
  • EA-131138 Check text range more precisely on converting.
  • Get rid of dependency on deprecated class com.intellij.openapi.diff.impl.processing.ByWord.

2018.2.783

  • UP-10120 Fix drawing of avatars when fractional scale factor is set on Windows.
  • EA-129060 Do not show user chooser popup inside write action.
  • UP-10075 Take comment text height into account when resizing the text field.

2018.1.730

  • UP-10081 Preserve comment when an error occurs while trying to leave a comment in the editor.
  • EA-128421 Do not open diff when project is disposed.
  • EA-128811 Iterate over immutable list.

2018.1.701

  • Do not fail when an error occurs during JavaFX initialization.

2018.1.653

  • UP-9873 Fix layout of "Leave a Comment" popup.
  • UP-9440 Do not fully shrink comment input field on "Leave a Comment" popup.

2018.1.629

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget
  • UP-10058 Add mnemonic Alt-V to "Review with Upsource" checkbox in commit dialog.
  • UP-10022 Do not hide connection errors.
  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.

  • UP-10790 Fix rendering comments via JCEF when scale factor is fractional.
  • UP-10764 Fix discussion details popup positioning when switching mode in markdown editor.

2020.1.1826

  • UP-10817 Set normal window level for component popups.

2020.1.1822

  • UP-10780 Add ability to resize discussion details popup.

2020.1.1819

  • UP-10811 Fix charset for comments rendered via JCEF when Java charset differs from OS default locale.
  • Fix notification popup window level.

2020.1.1812

  • Use heavyweight popup to show notification and discussion in editor due to JCEF requirements.

2020.1.1803

  • EA-236480 Fix NPE while reset connection settings.

2020.1.1790

  • UP-10765 Do not use com.intellij.util.Alarm.ThreadToUse.OWN_THREAD.
  • EA-217889 Prevent cyclic service initialization.
  • EA-231486 Suppress integration for default project.
  • EA-215772 Do not process notification when project is disposed.

2020.1.1769

  • UP-10664 Add ability to render comments via JCEF for IDEA 2020.2+.

2019.1.1698

  • EA-231488 Add compatibility with IDEA 2020.2+.

2019.1.1674

  • Drop compatibility with IDEA 2018.*.
  • Customize actions at proper moment for IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1632

  • UP-10625 Fix problems with unified diff.

2019.1.1626

  • UP-10618 Fix some assertions appeared due to changes in IDEA 2020.1.

2019.1.1616

  • Add compatibility with IDEA 2020.1+.

2019.1.1579

  • EA-219744 Fix NPE while handle change list changes.

2019.1.1577

  • UP-10577 Make compatible with Android Studio 4.0.

2019.1.1571

  • UP-10575 Make lower since-version for IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1560

  • UP-10562 Change "Accept changes" and "Raise concern" icons to correspond web interface ones.
  • UP-10552 Make "Pick a reaction" icon paler.

2019.1.1554

  • UP-8903 Show tooltip for "Message" column in review details.

2019.1.1537

  • UP-10510 Extract Java-specific part into optional plugin descriptor for IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1518

  • UP-10511 Remove usages of deprecated methods of com.intellij.util.containers.ContainerUtil.
  • UP-10506 Do not shorten names in feed.

2019.1.1506

  • Add compatibility with IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1501

  • UP-10484 Use different icons for "Show Diff" and "Compare with Local" actions.
  • EA-212321 Do not check if notification viewed when project is disposed.

2019.1.1473

  • UP-10461 Fix NoSuchMethodException while view local changes in unified diff.

2019.1.1467

  • EA-210139 Do not request application service com.intellij.ui.EditorTextFieldProvider as project service.
  • EA-137287 Do not commit discussions when project is disposed.
  • EA-142693 Do not update comment editor when project is disposed.
  • EA-209888 Do not register initializing routine when project is disposed.

2019.1.1437

  • Drop compatibility with IDEA 2017.*.
  • UP-10405 Add ability to not suggest review while commit.

2019.1.1423

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • UP-10391 Fix painting for file comments.

2019.1.1386

  • Remove usages of deprecated com.intellij.openapi.vcs.changes.ui.CommitChangeListDialog.getAffectedVcses.
  • Add plugin icon for IDEA 2019.1+.

2019.1.1362

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • EA-140913 Do not navigate to local file when text range is wrong.
  • UP-10346 Remove usages of deprecated VCS log filters constructors.

2019.1.1238

  • UP-10288 Add ability to open revision in Upsource from annotation's context menu.

2019.1.1226

  • UP-10299 Limit threads count from application pool that might be used.

2019.1.1194

  • EA-133845 Fix painting avatars for IDEA 2017.3.
  • Use SVG emoji icons for IDEA 2018.2+.
  • EA-133613 Fix NPE while navigate to Git log.

2019.1.1182

  • UP-9743 Provide links to review and revision in discussion header in feed when it is possible.
  • UP-10260 Add support for JBR11.
  • Fix rendering of build status column for IDEA 2019.1.

2018.2.1164

  • UP-9831 Use Platform UI to show revision details.

2018.2.1145

  • EA-133270 Do not schedule update of progress icon in feed when alarm is disposed.
  • UP-10205 Fix notification popup size.

2018.2.984

  • UP-9792 Bundle series of newly commented-out lines as one change in diff viewer.
  • EA-132803 Do not update discussions UI inside write action.
  • Add separators around modification actions in context menu of Reviews list.

2018.2.871

  • UP-9774 Fix tooltip text of inspection markers.
  • EA-131002 Catch and handle exception when there is no available port to listen to third-party authorization token.
  • EA-131138 Check text range more precisely on converting.
  • Get rid of dependency on deprecated class com.intellij.openapi.diff.impl.processing.ByWord.

2018.2.783

  • UP-10120 Fix drawing of avatars when fractional scale factor is set on Windows.
  • EA-129060 Do not show user chooser popup inside write action.
  • UP-10075 Take comment text height into account when resizing the text field.

2018.1.730

  • UP-10081 Preserve comment when an error occurs while trying to leave a comment in the editor.
  • EA-128421 Do not open diff when project is disposed.
  • EA-128811 Iterate over immutable list.

2018.1.701

  • Do not fail when an error occurs during JavaFX initialization.

2018.1.653

  • UP-9873 Fix layout of "Leave a Comment" popup.
  • UP-9440 Do not fully shrink comment input field on "Leave a Comment" popup.

2018.1.629

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget
  • UP-10058 Add mnemonic Alt-V to "Review with Upsource" checkbox in commit dialog.
  • UP-10022 Do not hide connection errors.
  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.

2018.1.629

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget
  • UP-10058 Add mnemonic Alt-V to "Review with Upsource" checkbox in commit dialog.
  • UP-10022 Do not hide connection errors.
  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.

• Get rid of usages of `com.intellij.xml.util.XmlTagUtilBase` removed in IDEA 2020.2.

2020.1.1894

  • UP-10615 Preserve line breaks in commit messages.

  • Get rid of usages of `com.intellij.reference.SoftReference.deref` removed in IDEA 2020.2.

  • EA-249143 Do not request resource from classloader using path with leading slash.

  • UP-10790 Fix rendering comments via JCEF when scale factor is fractional.

2020.1.1826

  • UP-10817 Set normal window level for component popups.

2020.1.1822

  • UP-10780 Add ability to resize discussion details popup.

2020.1.1819

  • UP-10811 Fix charset for comments rendered via JCEF when Java charset differs from OS default locale.
  • Fix notification popup window level.

2020.1.1812

  • Use heavyweight popup to show notification and discussion in editor due to JCEF requirements.

2020.1.1803

  • EA-236480 Fix NPE while reset connection settings.

2020.1.1790

  • UP-10765 Do not use com.intellij.util.Alarm.ThreadToUse.OWN_THREAD.

  • UP-10664 Add ability to render comments via JCEF for IDEA 2020.2+.

  • EA-231488 Add compatibility with IDEA 2020.2+.

  • Drop compatibility with IDEA 2018.*.
  • Customize actions at proper moment for IDEA 2019.3+.

  • UP-10625 Fix problems with unified diff.

2019.1.1626

  • UP-10618 Fix some assertions appeared due to changes in IDEA 2020.1.

2019.1.1616

  • Add compatibility with IDEA 2020.1+.

2019.1.1579

  • EA-219744 Fix NPE while handle change list changes.

2019.1.1577

  • UP-10577 Make compatible with Android Studio 4.0.

2019.1.1571

  • UP-10575 Make lower since-version for IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1560

  • UP-10562 Change "Accept changes" and "Raise concern" icons to correspond web interface ones.
  • UP-10552 Make "Pick a reaction" icon paler.

2019.1.1554

  • UP-8903 Show tooltip for "Message" column in review details.

2019.1.1537

  • UP-10510 Extract Java-specific part into optional plugin descriptor for IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1518

  • UP-10511 Remove usages of deprecated methods of com.intellij.util.containers.ContainerUtil.
  • UP-10506 Do not shorten names in feed.

2019.1.1506

  • Add compatibility with IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1501

  • UP-10484 Use different icons for "Show Diff" and "Compare with Local" actions.
  • EA-212321 Do not check if notification viewed when project is disposed.

2019.1.1473

  • UP-10461 Fix NoSuchMethodException while view local changes in unified diff.

2019.1.1467

  • EA-210139 Do not request application service com.intellij.ui.EditorTextFieldProvider as project service.
  • EA-137287 Do not commit discussions when project is disposed.
  • EA-142693 Do not update comment editor when project is disposed.
  • EA-209888 Do not register initializing routine when project is disposed.

2019.1.1437

  • Drop compatibility with IDEA 2017.*.
  • UP-10405 Add ability to not suggest review while commit.

2019.1.1423

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • UP-10391 Fix painting for file comments.

2019.1.1386

  • Remove usages of deprecated com.intellij.openapi.vcs.changes.ui.CommitChangeListDialog.getAffectedVcses.
  • Add plugin icon for IDEA 2019.1+.

2019.1.1362

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • EA-140913 Do not navigate to local file when text range is wrong.
  • UP-10346 Remove usages of deprecated VCS log filters constructors.

2019.1.1238

  • UP-10288 Add ability to open revision in Upsource from annotation's context menu.

2019.1.1226

  • UP-10299 Limit threads count from application pool that might be used.

2019.1.1194

  • EA-133845 Fix painting avatars for IDEA 2017.3.
  • Use SVG emoji icons for IDEA 2018.2+.
  • EA-133613 Fix NPE while navigate to Git log.

2019.1.1182

  • UP-9743 Provide links to review and revision in discussion header in feed when it is possible.
  • UP-10260 Add support for JBR11.
  • Fix rendering of build status column for IDEA 2019.1.

2018.2.1164

  • UP-9831 Use Platform UI to show revision details.

2018.2.1145

  • EA-133270 Do not schedule update of progress icon in feed when alarm is disposed.
  • UP-10205 Fix notification popup size.

2018.2.984

  • UP-9792 Bundle series of newly commented-out lines as one change in diff viewer.
  • EA-132803 Do not update discussions UI inside write action.
  • Add separators around modification actions in context menu of Reviews list.

2018.2.871

  • UP-9774 Fix tooltip text of inspection markers.
  • EA-131002 Catch and handle exception when there is no available port to listen to third-party authorization token.
  • EA-131138 Check text range more precisely on converting.
  • Get rid of dependency on deprecated class com.intellij.openapi.diff.impl.processing.ByWord.

2018.2.783

  • UP-10120 Fix drawing of avatars when fractional scale factor is set on Windows.
  • EA-129060 Do not show user chooser popup inside write action.
  • UP-10075 Take comment text height into account when resizing the text field.

2018.1.730

  • UP-10081 Preserve comment when an error occurs while trying to leave a comment in the editor.
  • EA-128421 Do not open diff when project is disposed.
  • EA-128811 Iterate over immutable list.

2018.1.701

  • Do not fail when an error occurs during JavaFX initialization.

2018.1.653

  • UP-9873 Fix layout of "Leave a Comment" popup.
  • UP-9440 Do not fully shrink comment input field on "Leave a Comment" popup.

  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.

2018.2.783

  • UP-10120 Fix drawing of avatars when fractional scale factor is set on Windows.
  • EA-129060 Do not show user chooser popup inside write action.
  • UP-10075 Take comment text height into account when resizing the text field.

2018.1.730

  • UP-10081 Preserve comment when an error occurs while trying to leave a comment in the editor.
  • EA-128421 Do not open diff when project is disposed.
  • EA-128811 Iterate over immutable list.

2018.1.701

  • Do not fail when an error occurs during JavaFX initialization.

2018.1.653

  • UP-9873 Fix layout of "Leave a Comment" popup.
  • UP-9440 Do not fully shrink comment input field on "Leave a Comment" popup.

2018.1.629

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget
  • UP-10058 Add mnemonic Alt-V to "Review with Upsource" checkbox in commit dialog.
  • UP-10022 Do not hide connection errors.
  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.

  • EA-131002 Catch and handle exception when there is no available port to listen to third-party authorization token.
  • EA-131138 Check text range more precisely on converting.
  • Get rid of dependency on deprecated class com.intellij.openapi.diff.impl.processing.ByWord.

2018.2.783

  • UP-10120 Fix drawing of avatars when fractional scale factor is set on Windows.
  • EA-129060 Do not show user chooser popup inside write action.
  • UP-10075 Take comment text height into account when resizing the text field.

2018.1.730

  • UP-10081 Preserve comment when an error occurs while trying to leave a comment in the editor.
  • EA-128421 Do not open diff when project is disposed.
  • EA-128811 Iterate over immutable list.

2018.1.701

  • Do not fail when an error occurs during JavaFX initialization.

2018.1.653

  • UP-9873 Fix layout of "Leave a Comment" popup.
  • UP-9440 Do not fully shrink comment input field on "Leave a Comment" popup.

2018.1.629

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget
  • UP-10058 Add mnemonic Alt-V to "Review with Upsource" checkbox in commit dialog.
  • UP-10022 Do not hide connection errors.
  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.

  • Add compatibility with IDEA 2019.3+.

  • Drop compatibility with IDEA 2017.*.

  • Add plugin icon for IDEA 2019.1+.

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.

  • UP-10288 Add ability to open revision in Upsource from annotation's context menu.

2019.1.1226

  • UP-10299 Limit threads count from application pool that might be used.

  • EA-133845 Fix painting avatars for IDEA 2017.3.

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget

  • UP-10510 Extract Java-specific part into optional plugin descriptor for IDEA 2019.3+.

  • Add compatibility with IDEA 2019.3+.

  • UP-10484 Use different icons for "Show Diff" and "Compare with Local" actions.

  • UP-10461 Fix NoSuchMethodException while view local changes in unified diff.

2019.1.1467

  • EA-210139 Do not request application service com.intellij.ui.EditorTextFieldProvider as project service.
  • EA-137287 Do not commit discussions when project is disposed.
  • EA-142693 Do not update comment editor when project is disposed.
  • EA-209888 Do not register initializing routine when project is disposed.

2019.1.1437

  • Drop compatibility with IDEA 2017.*.
  • UP-10405 Add ability to not suggest review while commit.

2019.1.1423

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.

  • Remove usages of deprecated com.intellij.openapi.vcs.changes.ui.CommitChangeListDialog.getAffectedVcses.

2019.1.1362

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • EA-140913 Do not navigate to local file when text range is wrong.
  • UP-10346 Remove usages of deprecated VCS log filters constructors.

2019.1.1238

  • UP-10288 Add ability to open revision in Upsource from annotation's context menu.

2019.1.1226

  • UP-10299 Limit threads count from application pool that might be used.

2019.1.1194

  • EA-133845 Fix painting avatars for IDEA 2017.3.
  • Use SVG emoji icons for IDEA 2018.2+.
  • EA-133613 Fix NPE while navigate to Git log.

2019.1.1182

  • UP-9743 Provide links to review and revision in discussion header in feed when it is possible.

2018.2.1164

  • UP-9831 Use Platform UI to show revision details.

  • EA-133270 Do not schedule update of progress icon in feed when alarm is disposed.

2018.2.984

  • UP-9792 Bundle series of newly commented-out lines as one change in diff viewer.

  • UP-9774 Fix tooltip text of inspection markers.

2018.2.783

  • UP-10120 Fix drawing of avatars when fractional scale factor is set on Windows.

• UP-10817 Set normal window level for component popups.

2020.1.1822

  • UP-10780 Add ability to resize discussion details popup.

2020.1.1819

  • UP-10811 Fix charset for comments rendered via JCEF when Java charset differs from OS default locale.
  • Fix notification popup window level.

2020.1.1812

  • Use heavyweight popup to show notification and discussion in editor due to JCEF requirements.

2020.1.1803

  • EA-236480 Fix NPE while reset connection settings.

2020.1.1790

  • UP-10765 Do not use com.intellij.util.Alarm.ThreadToUse.OWN_THREAD.
  • EA-217889 Prevent cyclic service initialization.
  • EA-231486 Suppress integration for default project.
  • EA-215772 Do not process notification when project is disposed.

2020.1.1769

  • UP-10664 Add ability to render comments via JCEF for IDEA 2020.2+.

2019.1.1698

  • EA-231488 Add compatibility with IDEA 2020.2+.

2019.1.1674

  • Drop compatibility with IDEA 2018.*.
  • Customize actions at proper moment for IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1632

  • UP-10625 Fix problems with unified diff.

2019.1.1626

  • UP-10618 Fix some assertions appeared due to changes in IDEA 2020.1.

2019.1.1616

  • Add compatibility with IDEA 2020.1+.

2019.1.1579

  • EA-219744 Fix NPE while handle change list changes.

2019.1.1577

  • UP-10577 Make compatible with Android Studio 4.0.

2019.1.1571

  • UP-10575 Make lower since-version for IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1560

  • UP-10562 Change "Accept changes" and "Raise concern" icons to correspond web interface ones.
  • UP-10552 Make "Pick a reaction" icon paler.

2019.1.1554

  • UP-8903 Show tooltip for "Message" column in review details.

2019.1.1537

  • UP-10510 Extract Java-specific part into optional plugin descriptor for IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1518

  • UP-10511 Remove usages of deprecated methods of com.intellij.util.containers.ContainerUtil.
  • UP-10506 Do not shorten names in feed.

2019.1.1506

  • Add compatibility with IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1501

  • UP-10484 Use different icons for "Show Diff" and "Compare with Local" actions.
  • EA-212321 Do not check if notification viewed when project is disposed.

2019.1.1473

  • UP-10461 Fix NoSuchMethodException while view local changes in unified diff.

2019.1.1467

  • EA-210139 Do not request application service com.intellij.ui.EditorTextFieldProvider as project service.
  • EA-137287 Do not commit discussions when project is disposed.
  • EA-142693 Do not update comment editor when project is disposed.
  • EA-209888 Do not register initializing routine when project is disposed.

2019.1.1437

  • Drop compatibility with IDEA 2017.*.
  • UP-10405 Add ability to not suggest review while commit.

2019.1.1423

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • UP-10391 Fix painting for file comments.

2019.1.1386

  • Remove usages of deprecated com.intellij.openapi.vcs.changes.ui.CommitChangeListDialog.getAffectedVcses.
  • Add plugin icon for IDEA 2019.1+.

2019.1.1362

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • EA-140913 Do not navigate to local file when text range is wrong.
  • UP-10346 Remove usages of deprecated VCS log filters constructors.

2019.1.1238

  • UP-10288 Add ability to open revision in Upsource from annotation's context menu.

2019.1.1226

  • UP-10299 Limit threads count from application pool that might be used.

2019.1.1194

  • EA-133845 Fix painting avatars for IDEA 2017.3.
  • Use SVG emoji icons for IDEA 2018.2+.
  • EA-133613 Fix NPE while navigate to Git log.

2019.1.1182

  • UP-9743 Provide links to review and revision in discussion header in feed when it is possible.
  • UP-10260 Add support for JBR11.
  • Fix rendering of build status column for IDEA 2019.1.

2018.2.1164

  • UP-9831 Use Platform UI to show revision details.

2018.2.1145

  • EA-133270 Do not schedule update of progress icon in feed when alarm is disposed.
  • UP-10205 Fix notification popup size.

2018.2.984

  • UP-9792 Bundle series of newly commented-out lines as one change in diff viewer.
  • EA-132803 Do not update discussions UI inside write action.
  • Add separators around modification actions in context menu of Reviews list.

2018.2.871

  • UP-9774 Fix tooltip text of inspection markers.
  • EA-131002 Catch and handle exception when there is no available port to listen to third-party authorization token.
  • EA-131138 Check text range more precisely on converting.
  • Get rid of dependency on deprecated class com.intellij.openapi.diff.impl.processing.ByWord.

2018.2.783

  • UP-10120 Fix drawing of avatars when fractional scale factor is set on Windows.
  • EA-129060 Do not show user chooser popup inside write action.
  • UP-10075 Take comment text height into account when resizing the text field.

2018.1.730

  • UP-10081 Preserve comment when an error occurs while trying to leave a comment in the editor.
  • EA-128421 Do not open diff when project is disposed.
  • EA-128811 Iterate over immutable list.

2018.1.701

  • Do not fail when an error occurs during JavaFX initialization.

2018.1.653

  • UP-9873 Fix layout of "Leave a Comment" popup.
  • UP-9440 Do not fully shrink comment input field on "Leave a Comment" popup.

2018.1.629

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget
  • UP-10058 Add mnemonic Alt-V to "Review with Upsource" checkbox in commit dialog.
  • UP-10022 Do not hide connection errors.
  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.

2019.1.1537

  • UP-10510 Extract Java-specific part into optional plugin descriptor for IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1518

  • UP-10511 Remove usages of deprecated methods of com.intellij.util.containers.ContainerUtil.
  • UP-10506 Do not shorten names in feed.

2019.1.1506

  • Add compatibility with IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1501

  • UP-10484 Use different icons for "Show Diff" and "Compare with Local" actions.
  • EA-212321 Do not check if notification viewed when project is disposed.

2019.1.1473

  • UP-10461 Fix NoSuchMethodException while view local changes in unified diff.

2019.1.1467

  • EA-210139 Do not request application service com.intellij.ui.EditorTextFieldProvider as project service.
  • EA-137287 Do not commit discussions when project is disposed.
  • EA-142693 Do not update comment editor when project is disposed.
  • EA-209888 Do not register initializing routine when project is disposed.

2019.1.1437

  • Drop compatibility with IDEA 2017.*.
  • UP-10405 Add ability to not suggest review while commit.

2019.1.1423

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • UP-10391 Fix painting for file comments.

2019.1.1386

  • Remove usages of deprecated com.intellij.openapi.vcs.changes.ui.CommitChangeListDialog.getAffectedVcses.
  • Add plugin icon for IDEA 2019.1+.

2019.1.1362

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • EA-140913 Do not navigate to local file when text range is wrong.
  • UP-10346 Remove usages of deprecated VCS log filters constructors.

2019.1.1238

  • UP-10288 Add ability to open revision in Upsource from annotation's context menu.

2019.1.1226

  • UP-10299 Limit threads count from application pool that might be used.

2019.1.1194

  • EA-133845 Fix painting avatars for IDEA 2017.3.
  • Use SVG emoji icons for IDEA 2018.2+.
  • EA-133613 Fix NPE while navigate to Git log.

2019.1.1182

  • UP-9743 Provide links to review and revision in discussion header in feed when it is possible.
  • UP-10260 Add support for JBR11.
  • Fix rendering of build status column for IDEA 2019.1.

2018.2.1164

  • UP-9831 Use Platform UI to show revision details.

2018.2.1145

  • EA-133270 Do not schedule update of progress icon in feed when alarm is disposed.
  • UP-10205 Fix notification popup size.

2018.2.984

  • UP-9792 Bundle series of newly commented-out lines as one change in diff viewer.
  • EA-132803 Do not update discussions UI inside write action.
  • Add separators around modification actions in context menu of Reviews list.

2018.2.871

  • UP-9774 Fix tooltip text of inspection markers.
  • EA-131002 Catch and handle exception when there is no available port to listen to third-party authorization token.
  • EA-131138 Check text range more precisely on converting.
  • Get rid of dependency on deprecated class com.intellij.openapi.diff.impl.processing.ByWord.

2018.2.783

  • UP-10120 Fix drawing of avatars when fractional scale factor is set on Windows.
  • EA-129060 Do not show user chooser popup inside write action.
  • UP-10075 Take comment text height into account when resizing the text field.

2018.1.730

  • UP-10081 Preserve comment when an error occurs while trying to leave a comment in the editor.
  • EA-128421 Do not open diff when project is disposed.
  • EA-128811 Iterate over immutable list.

2018.1.701

  • Do not fail when an error occurs during JavaFX initialization.

2018.1.653

  • UP-9873 Fix layout of "Leave a Comment" popup.
  • UP-9440 Do not fully shrink comment input field on "Leave a Comment" popup.

2018.1.629

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget
  • UP-10058 Add mnemonic Alt-V to "Review with Upsource" checkbox in commit dialog.
  • UP-10022 Do not hide connection errors.
  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.

2018.2.984

  • UP-9792 Bundle series of newly commented-out lines as one change in diff viewer.
  • EA-132803 Do not update discussions UI inside write action.
  • Add separators around modification actions in context menu of Reviews list.

2018.2.871

  • UP-9774 Fix tooltip text of inspection markers.
  • EA-131002 Catch and handle exception when there is no available port to listen to third-party authorization token.
  • EA-131138 Check text range more precisely on converting.
  • Get rid of dependency on deprecated class com.intellij.openapi.diff.impl.processing.ByWord.

2018.2.783

  • UP-10120 Fix drawing of avatars when fractional scale factor is set on Windows.
  • EA-129060 Do not show user chooser popup inside write action.
  • UP-10075 Take comment text height into account when resizing the text field.

2018.1.730

  • UP-10081 Preserve comment when an error occurs while trying to leave a comment in the editor.
  • EA-128421 Do not open diff when project is disposed.
  • EA-128811 Iterate over immutable list.

2018.1.701

  • Do not fail when an error occurs during JavaFX initialization.

2018.1.653

  • UP-9873 Fix layout of "Leave a Comment" popup.
  • UP-9440 Do not fully shrink comment input field on "Leave a Comment" popup.

2018.1.629

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget
  • UP-10058 Add mnemonic Alt-V to "Review with Upsource" checkbox in commit dialog.
  • UP-10022 Do not hide connection errors.
  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.

2019.1.1571

  • UP-10575 Make lower since-version for IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1560

  • UP-10562 Change "Accept changes" and "Raise concern" icons to correspond web interface ones.
  • UP-10552 Make "Pick a reaction" icon paler.

2019.1.1554

  • UP-8903 Show tooltip for "Message" column in review details.

2019.1.1537

  • UP-10510 Extract Java-specific part into optional plugin descriptor for IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1518

  • UP-10511 Remove usages of deprecated methods of com.intellij.util.containers.ContainerUtil.
  • UP-10506 Do not shorten names in feed.

2019.1.1506

  • Add compatibility with IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1501

  • UP-10484 Use different icons for "Show Diff" and "Compare with Local" actions.
  • EA-212321 Do not check if notification viewed when project is disposed.

2019.1.1473

  • UP-10461 Fix NoSuchMethodException while view local changes in unified diff.

2019.1.1467

  • EA-210139 Do not request application service com.intellij.ui.EditorTextFieldProvider as project service.
  • EA-137287 Do not commit discussions when project is disposed.
  • EA-142693 Do not update comment editor when project is disposed.
  • EA-209888 Do not register initializing routine when project is disposed.

2019.1.1437

  • Drop compatibility with IDEA 2017.*.
  • UP-10405 Add ability to not suggest review while commit.

2019.1.1423

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • UP-10391 Fix painting for file comments.

2019.1.1386

  • Remove usages of deprecated com.intellij.openapi.vcs.changes.ui.CommitChangeListDialog.getAffectedVcses.
  • Add plugin icon for IDEA 2019.1+.

2019.1.1362

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • EA-140913 Do not navigate to local file when text range is wrong.
  • UP-10346 Remove usages of deprecated VCS log filters constructors.

2019.1.1238

  • UP-10288 Add ability to open revision in Upsource from annotation's context menu.

2019.1.1226

  • UP-10299 Limit threads count from application pool that might be used.

2019.1.1194

  • EA-133845 Fix painting avatars for IDEA 2017.3.
  • Use SVG emoji icons for IDEA 2018.2+.
  • EA-133613 Fix NPE while navigate to Git log.

2019.1.1182

  • UP-9743 Provide links to review and revision in discussion header in feed when it is possible.
  • UP-10260 Add support for JBR11.
  • Fix rendering of build status column for IDEA 2019.1.

2018.2.1164

  • UP-9831 Use Platform UI to show revision details.

2018.2.1145

  • EA-133270 Do not schedule update of progress icon in feed when alarm is disposed.
  • UP-10205 Fix notification popup size.

2018.2.984

  • UP-9792 Bundle series of newly commented-out lines as one change in diff viewer.
  • EA-132803 Do not update discussions UI inside write action.
  • Add separators around modification actions in context menu of Reviews list.

2018.2.871

  • UP-9774 Fix tooltip text of inspection markers.
  • EA-131002 Catch and handle exception when there is no available port to listen to third-party authorization token.
  • EA-131138 Check text range more precisely on converting.
  • Get rid of dependency on deprecated class com.intellij.openapi.diff.impl.processing.ByWord.

2018.2.783

  • UP-10120 Fix drawing of avatars when fractional scale factor is set on Windows.
  • EA-129060 Do not show user chooser popup inside write action.
  • UP-10075 Take comment text height into account when resizing the text field.

2018.1.730

  • UP-10081 Preserve comment when an error occurs while trying to leave a comment in the editor.
  • EA-128421 Do not open diff when project is disposed.
  • EA-128811 Iterate over immutable list.

2018.1.701

  • Do not fail when an error occurs during JavaFX initialization.

2018.1.653

  • UP-9873 Fix layout of "Leave a Comment" popup.
  • UP-9440 Do not fully shrink comment input field on "Leave a Comment" popup.

2018.1.629

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget
  • UP-10058 Add mnemonic Alt-V to "Review with Upsource" checkbox in commit dialog.
  • UP-10022 Do not hide connection errors.
  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.

  • UP-9873 Fix layout of "Leave a Comment" popup.
  • UP-9440 Do not fully shrink comment input field on "Leave a Comment" popup.

2018.1.629

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget
  • UP-10058 Add mnemonic Alt-V to "Review with Upsource" checkbox in commit dialog.
  • UP-10022 Do not hide connection errors.
  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.

  • UP-8903 Show tooltip for "Message" column in review details.

  • UP-10510 Extract Java-specific part into optional plugin descriptor for IDEA 2019.3+.

  • UP-10511 Remove usages of deprecated methods of com.intellij.util.containers.ContainerUtil.

2019.1.1506

  • Add compatibility with IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1501

  • UP-10484 Use different icons for "Show Diff" and "Compare with Local" actions.

2019.1.1473

  • UP-10461 Fix NoSuchMethodException while view local changes in unified diff.

2019.1.1467

  • EA-210139 Do not request application service com.intellij.ui.EditorTextFieldProvider as project service.
  • EA-137287 Do not commit discussions when project is disposed.
  • EA-142693 Do not update comment editor when project is disposed.
  • EA-209888 Do not register initializing routine when project is disposed.

2019.1.1437

  • Drop compatibility with IDEA 2017.*.
  • UP-10405 Add ability to not suggest review while commit.

2019.1.1423

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.

2019.1.1386

  • Remove usages of deprecated com.intellij.openapi.vcs.changes.ui.CommitChangeListDialog.getAffectedVcses.
  • Add plugin icon for IDEA 2019.1+.

2019.1.1362

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • EA-140913 Do not navigate to local file when text range is wrong.

2019.1.1238

  • UP-10288 Add ability to open revision in Upsource from annotation's context menu.

2019.1.1226

  • UP-10299 Limit threads count from application pool that might be used.

2019.1.1194

  • EA-133845 Fix painting avatars for IDEA 2017.3.
  • Use SVG emoji icons for IDEA 2018.2+.

2019.1.1182

  • UP-9743 Provide links to review and revision in discussion header in feed when it is possible.

2018.2.1164

  • UP-9831 Use Platform UI to show revision details.

2018.2.1145

  • EA-133270 Do not schedule update of progress icon in feed when alarm is disposed.
  • UP-10205 Fix notification popup size.

2018.2.984

  • UP-9792 Bundle series of newly commented-out lines as one change in diff viewer.
  • EA-132803 Do not update discussions UI inside write action.
  • Add separators around modification actions in context menu of Reviews list.

2018.2.871

  • UP-9774 Fix tooltip text of inspection markers.
  • EA-131002 Catch and handle exception when there is no available port to listen to third-party authorization token.
  • EA-131138 Check text range more precisely on converting.
  • Get rid of dependency on deprecated class com.intellij.openapi.diff.impl.processing.ByWord.

2018.2.783

  • UP-10120 Fix drawing of avatars when fractional scale factor is set on Windows.
  • EA-129060 Do not show user chooser popup inside write action.
  • UP-10075 Take comment text height into account when resizing the text field.

2018.1.730

  • UP-10081 Preserve comment when an error occurs while trying to leave a comment in the editor.

  • UP-10120 Fix drawing of avatars when fractional scale factor is set on Windows.
  • EA-129060 Do not show user chooser popup inside write action.
  • UP-10075 Take comment text height into account when resizing the text field.

2018.1.730

  • UP-10081 Preserve comment when an error occurs while trying to leave a comment in the editor.
  • EA-128421 Do not open diff when project is disposed.
  • EA-128811 Iterate over immutable list.

2018.1.701

  • Do not fail when an error occurs during JavaFX initialization.

2018.1.653

  • UP-9873 Fix layout of "Leave a Comment" popup.
  • UP-9440 Do not fully shrink comment input field on "Leave a Comment" popup.

2018.1.629

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget
  • UP-10058 Add mnemonic Alt-V to "Review with Upsource" checkbox in commit dialog.
  • UP-10022 Do not hide connection errors.
  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.

  • UP-10625 Fix problems with unified diff.

  • UP-10618 Fix some assertions appeared due to changes in IDEA 2020.1.

  • Add compatibility with IDEA 2020.1+.

2019.1.1579

  • EA-219744 Fix NPE while handle change list changes.

2019.1.1577

  • UP-10577 Make compatible with Android Studio 4.0.

2019.1.1571

  • UP-10575 Make lower since-version for IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1560

  • UP-10562 Change "Accept changes" and "Raise concern" icons to correspond web interface ones.
  • UP-10552 Make "Pick a reaction" icon paler.

2019.1.1554

  • UP-8903 Show tooltip for "Message" column in review details.

2019.1.1537

  • UP-10510 Extract Java-specific part into optional plugin descriptor for IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1518

  • UP-10511 Remove usages of deprecated methods of com.intellij.util.containers.ContainerUtil.
  • UP-10506 Do not shorten names in feed.

2019.1.1506

  • Add compatibility with IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1501

  • UP-10484 Use different icons for "Show Diff" and "Compare with Local" actions.
  • EA-212321 Do not check if notification viewed when project is disposed.

2019.1.1473

  • UP-10461 Fix NoSuchMethodException while view local changes in unified diff.

2019.1.1467

  • EA-210139 Do not request application service com.intellij.ui.EditorTextFieldProvider as project service.
  • EA-137287 Do not commit discussions when project is disposed.
  • EA-142693 Do not update comment editor when project is disposed.
  • EA-209888 Do not register initializing routine when project is disposed.

2019.1.1437

  • Drop compatibility with IDEA 2017.*.
  • UP-10405 Add ability to not suggest review while commit.

2019.1.1423

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • UP-10391 Fix painting for file comments.

2019.1.1386

  • Remove usages of deprecated com.intellij.openapi.vcs.changes.ui.CommitChangeListDialog.getAffectedVcses.
  • Add plugin icon for IDEA 2019.1+.

2019.1.1362

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • EA-140913 Do not navigate to local file when text range is wrong.
  • UP-10346 Remove usages of deprecated VCS log filters constructors.

2019.1.1238

  • UP-10288 Add ability to open revision in Upsource from annotation's context menu.

2019.1.1226

  • UP-10299 Limit threads count from application pool that might be used.

2019.1.1194

  • EA-133845 Fix painting avatars for IDEA 2017.3.
  • Use SVG emoji icons for IDEA 2018.2+.
  • EA-133613 Fix NPE while navigate to Git log.

2019.1.1182

  • UP-9743 Provide links to review and revision in discussion header in feed when it is possible.
  • UP-10260 Add support for JBR11.
  • Fix rendering of build status column for IDEA 2019.1.

2018.2.1164

  • UP-9831 Use Platform UI to show revision details.

2018.2.1145

  • EA-133270 Do not schedule update of progress icon in feed when alarm is disposed.
  • UP-10205 Fix notification popup size.

2018.2.984

  • UP-9792 Bundle series of newly commented-out lines as one change in diff viewer.
  • EA-132803 Do not update discussions UI inside write action.
  • Add separators around modification actions in context menu of Reviews list.

2018.2.871

  • UP-9774 Fix tooltip text of inspection markers.
  • EA-131002 Catch and handle exception when there is no available port to listen to third-party authorization token.
  • EA-131138 Check text range more precisely on converting.
  • Get rid of dependency on deprecated class com.intellij.openapi.diff.impl.processing.ByWord.

2018.2.783

  • UP-10120 Fix drawing of avatars when fractional scale factor is set on Windows.
  • EA-129060 Do not show user chooser popup inside write action.
  • UP-10075 Take comment text height into account when resizing the text field.

2018.1.730

  • UP-10081 Preserve comment when an error occurs while trying to leave a comment in the editor.

  • EA-128811 Iterate over immutable list.

  • EA-128421 Do not open diff when project is disposed.
  • EA-128811 Iterate over immutable list.

2018.1.701

  • Do not fail when an error occurs during JavaFX initialization.

2018.1.653

  • UP-9873 Fix layout of "Leave a Comment" popup.
  • UP-9440 Do not fully shrink comment input field on "Leave a Comment" popup.

2018.1.629

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget
  • UP-10058 Add mnemonic Alt-V to "Review with Upsource" checkbox in commit dialog.
  • UP-10022 Do not hide connection errors.
  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.

Note: If you want to have access to the most recent bug fixes and features of the plugin, you can install it from the alpha channel. To do so please add the following custom plugin repository: https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugins/alpha/7431
idea-plugin.change-notes:
• UP-10625 Fix problems with unified diff.

2019.1.1626

  • UP-10618 Fix some assertions appeared due to changes in IDEA 2020.1.

2019.1.1616

  • Add compatibility with IDEA 2020.1+.

2019.1.1579

  • EA-219744 Fix NPE while handle change list changes.

2019.1.1577

  • UP-10577 Make compatible with Android Studio 4.0.

2019.1.1571

  • UP-10575 Make lower since-version for IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1560

  • UP-10562 Change "Accept changes" and "Raise concern" icons to correspond web interface ones.
  • UP-10552 Make "Pick a reaction" icon paler.

2019.1.1554

  • UP-8903 Show tooltip for "Message" column in review details.

2019.1.1537

  • UP-10510 Extract Java-specific part into optional plugin descriptor for IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1518

  • UP-10511 Remove usages of deprecated methods of com.intellij.util.containers.ContainerUtil.
  • UP-10506 Do not shorten names in feed.

2019.1.1506

  • Add compatibility with IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1501

  • UP-10484 Use different icons for "Show Diff" and "Compare with Local" actions.
  • EA-212321 Do not check if notification viewed when project is disposed.

2019.1.1473

  • UP-10461 Fix NoSuchMethodException while view local changes in unified diff.

2019.1.1467

  • EA-210139 Do not request application service com.intellij.ui.EditorTextFieldProvider as project service.
  • EA-137287 Do not commit discussions when project is disposed.
  • EA-142693 Do not update comment editor when project is disposed.
  • EA-209888 Do not register initializing routine when project is disposed.

2019.1.1437

  • Drop compatibility with IDEA 2017.*.
  • UP-10405 Add ability to not suggest review while commit.

2019.1.1423

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • UP-10391 Fix painting for file comments.

2019.1.1386

  • Remove usages of deprecated com.intellij.openapi.vcs.changes.ui.CommitChangeListDialog.getAffectedVcses.
  • Add plugin icon for IDEA 2019.1+.

2019.1.1362

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • EA-140913 Do not navigate to local file when text range is wrong.
  • UP-10346 Remove usages of deprecated VCS log filters constructors.

2019.1.1238

  • UP-10288 Add ability to open revision in Upsource from annotation's context menu.

2019.1.1226

  • UP-10299 Limit threads count from application pool that might be used.

2019.1.1194

  • EA-133845 Fix painting avatars for IDEA 2017.3.
  • Use SVG emoji icons for IDEA 2018.2+.
  • EA-133613 Fix NPE while navigate to Git log.

2019.1.1182

  • UP-9743 Provide links to review and revision in discussion header in feed when it is possible.
  • UP-10260 Add support for JBR11.
  • Fix rendering of build status column for IDEA 2019.1.

2018.2.1164

  • UP-9831 Use Platform UI to show revision details.

2018.2.1145

  • EA-133270 Do not schedule update of progress icon in feed when alarm is disposed.
  • UP-10205 Fix notification popup size.

2018.2.984

  • UP-9792 Bundle series of newly commented-out lines as one change in diff viewer.
  • EA-132803 Do not update discussions UI inside write action.
  • Add separators around modification actions in context menu of Reviews list.

2018.2.871

  • UP-9774 Fix tooltip text of inspection markers.
  • EA-131002 Catch and handle exception when there is no available port to listen to third-party authorization token.
  • EA-131138 Check text range more precisely on converting.
  • Get rid of dependency on deprecated class com.intellij.openapi.diff.impl.processing.ByWord.

2018.2.783

  • UP-10120 Fix drawing of avatars when fractional scale factor is set on Windows.
  • EA-129060 Do not show user chooser popup inside write action.
  • UP-10075 Take comment text height into account when resizing the text field.

2018.1.730

  • UP-10081 Preserve comment when an error occurs while trying to leave a comment in the editor.
  • EA-128421 Do not open diff when project is disposed.
  • EA-128811 Iterate over immutable list.

2018.1.701

  • Do not fail when an error occurs during JavaFX initialization.

2018.1.653

  • UP-9873 Fix layout of "Leave a Comment" popup.
  • UP-9440 Do not fully shrink comment input field on "Leave a Comment" popup.

2018.1.629

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget
  • UP-10058 Add mnemonic Alt-V to "Review with Upsource" checkbox in commit dialog.
  • UP-10022 Do not hide connection errors.
  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.

idea-plugin.change-notes:
• UP-10618 Fix some assertions appeared due to changes in IDEA 2020.1.

2019.1.1616

  • Add compatibility with IDEA 2020.1+.

2019.1.1579

  • EA-219744 Fix NPE while handle change list changes.

2019.1.1577

  • UP-10577 Make compatible with Android Studio 4.0.

2019.1.1571

  • UP-10575 Make lower since-version for IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1560

  • UP-10562 Change "Accept changes" and "Raise concern" icons to correspond web interface ones.
  • UP-10552 Make "Pick a reaction" icon paler.

2019.1.1554

  • UP-8903 Show tooltip for "Message" column in review details.

2019.1.1537

  • UP-10510 Extract Java-specific part into optional plugin descriptor for IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1518

  • UP-10511 Remove usages of deprecated methods of com.intellij.util.containers.ContainerUtil.
  • UP-10506 Do not shorten names in feed.

2019.1.1506

  • Add compatibility with IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1501

  • UP-10484 Use different icons for "Show Diff" and "Compare with Local" actions.
  • EA-212321 Do not check if notification viewed when project is disposed.

2019.1.1473

  • UP-10461 Fix NoSuchMethodException while view local changes in unified diff.

2019.1.1467

  • EA-210139 Do not request application service com.intellij.ui.EditorTextFieldProvider as project service.
  • EA-137287 Do not commit discussions when project is disposed.
  • EA-142693 Do not update comment editor when project is disposed.
  • EA-209888 Do not register initializing routine when project is disposed.

2019.1.1437

  • Drop compatibility with IDEA 2017.*.
  • UP-10405 Add ability to not suggest review while commit.

2019.1.1423

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • UP-10391 Fix painting for file comments.

2019.1.1386

  • Remove usages of deprecated com.intellij.openapi.vcs.changes.ui.CommitChangeListDialog.getAffectedVcses.
  • Add plugin icon for IDEA 2019.1+.

2019.1.1362

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • EA-140913 Do not navigate to local file when text range is wrong.
  • UP-10346 Remove usages of deprecated VCS log filters constructors.

2019.1.1238

  • UP-10288 Add ability to open revision in Upsource from annotation's context menu.

2019.1.1226

  • UP-10299 Limit threads count from application pool that might be used.

2019.1.1194

  • EA-133845 Fix painting avatars for IDEA 2017.3.
  • Use SVG emoji icons for IDEA 2018.2+.
  • EA-133613 Fix NPE while navigate to Git log.

2019.1.1182

  • UP-9743 Provide links to review and revision in discussion header in feed when it is possible.
  • UP-10260 Add support for JBR11.
  • Fix rendering of build status column for IDEA 2019.1.

2018.2.1164

  • UP-9831 Use Platform UI to show revision details.

2018.2.1145

  • EA-133270 Do not schedule update of progress icon in feed when alarm is disposed.
  • UP-10205 Fix notification popup size.

2018.2.984

  • UP-9792 Bundle series of newly commented-out lines as one change in diff viewer.
  • EA-132803 Do not update discussions UI inside write action.
  • Add separators around modification actions in context menu of Reviews list.

2018.2.871

  • UP-9774 Fix tooltip text of inspection markers.
  • EA-131002 Catch and handle exception when there is no available port to listen to third-party authorization token.
  • EA-131138 Check text range more precisely on converting.
  • Get rid of dependency on deprecated class com.intellij.openapi.diff.impl.processing.ByWord.

2018.2.783

  • UP-10120 Fix drawing of avatars when fractional scale factor is set on Windows.
  • EA-129060 Do not show user chooser popup inside write action.
  • UP-10075 Take comment text height into account when resizing the text field.

2018.1.730

  • UP-10081 Preserve comment when an error occurs while trying to leave a comment in the editor.
  • EA-128421 Do not open diff when project is disposed.
  • EA-128811 Iterate over immutable list.

2018.1.701

  • Do not fail when an error occurs during JavaFX initialization.

2018.1.653

  • UP-9873 Fix layout of "Leave a Comment" popup.
  • UP-9440 Do not fully shrink comment input field on "Leave a Comment" popup.

2018.1.629

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget
  • UP-10058 Add mnemonic Alt-V to "Review with Upsource" checkbox in commit dialog.
  • UP-10022 Do not hide connection errors.
  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.
