  • UP-10511 Remove usages of deprecated methods of com.intellij.util.containers.ContainerUtil.
  • UP-10506< /a> Do not shorten names in feed.

2019.1.1506

  • Add compatibility with IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1501

  • UP-10484 Use different icons for "Show Diff" and "Compa re with Local" actions.
  • EA-212321 Do not check if notification viewed when project is disposed.

2019.1.1473

  • UP-10461 Fix NoSuchMethodException while view local changes in unified d iff.

2019.1.1467

  • EA-210139 Do not request application service com.intellij.ui.EditorTextFieldProvider as project service.
  • EA-137287 Do not commit discussions when project is disposed.
  • EA-142693 Do not update comment editor wh en project is disposed.
  • EA-209888 Do not register initializing routine when project is disposed.

2019.1.1437

  • Drop compatibility with IDEA 2017.*.
  • UP-10405 Add abilit y to not suggest review while commit.

2019.1.1423

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • UP-10391 Fix painting for file comments.

2019.1.1386

  • Remove usages of deprecated com.intellij.openapi.vcs.changes.ui.CommitChangeListDialog.getAffectedVcses.
  • Add plugin icon for IDEA 2019.1+.

2019.1.1362

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModif icationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • EA-140913 Do not navigate to local file when text range is wrong.
  • UP-10346 Remove usages of deprecated VCS log filters constructors.

2019.1.1238

  • UP-10288 Add ability to open revision in Upsource from annotation's context menu.

2019.1.1226

  • UP-10299 Limit threads count from application pool that might be used.

2019.1.1194

  • EA-133845 Fix painting avatars for IDEA 2017.3.
  • Use SVG emoji icons for IDEA 2018.2+.
  • EA-133613 Fix NPE while navigate to Git log.

2019.1.1182

  • UP-9743 Provide links to review and revision in discussion header in feed when it is possible.
  • UP-10260 Add support for JBR11.
  • Fix rendering of build status column for IDEA 2019.1.

2018.2.1164

  • UP-9831 Use Platform UI to show revision details.

2018.2.1145

  • EA-133270 Do not schedule update of progress icon in feed when alarm is disposed.
  • UP-10205 Fix notification popup size.

2018.2.984

  • UP-9792 Bundle series of newly commented-out lines as one change in diff viewer.
  • EA-132803 Do not update discussions UI inside write action.
  • Add separators around modification actions in context menu of Reviews list.

2018.2.871

  • UP-9774 Fix tooltip text of inspection markers.
  • EA-131002 Catch and handle exception when there is no available port to listen to third-party authorization token.
  • EA-131138 Check text range more precisely on converting.
  • Get rid of dependency on deprecated class com.intellij.openapi.diff.impl.processing.ByWord.

2018.2.783

  • UP-10120 Fix drawing of avatars when fractional scale factor is set on Windows.
  • EA-129060 Do not show user chooser popup inside write action.
  • UP-10075 Take comment text height into account when resizing the text field.

2018.1.730

  • UP-10081 Preserve comment when an error occurs while trying to leave a comment in the editor.
  • EA-128421 Do not open diff when project is disposed.
  • EA-128811 Iterate over immutable list.

2018.1.701

  • Do not fail when an error occurs during JavaFX initialization.

2018.1.653

  • UP-9873 Fix layout of "Leave a Comment" popup.
  • UP-9440 Do not fully shrink comment input field on "Leave a Comment" popup.

2018.1.629

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget
  • UP-10058 Add mnemonic Alt-V to "Review with Upsource" checkbox in commit dialog.
  • UP-10022 Do not hide connection errors.
  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.

2019.1.1194

  • EA-133845 Fix painting avatars for IDEA 2017.3.
  • Use SVG emoji icons for IDEA 2018.2+.
  • EA-133613 Fix NPE while navigate to Git log.

2019.1.1182

  • UP-9743 Provide links to review and revision in discussion header in feed when it is possible.
  • UP-10260 Add support for JBR11.
  • Fix rendering of build status column for IDEA 2019.1.

2018.2.1164

  • UP-9831 Use Platform UI to show revision details.

2018.2.1145

  • EA-133270 Do not schedule update of progress icon in feed when alarm is disposed.
  • UP-10205 Fix notification popup size.

2018.2.984

  • UP-9792 Bundle series of newly commented-out lines as one change in diff viewer.
  • EA-132803 Do not update discussions UI inside write action.
  • Add separators around modification actions in context menu of Reviews list.

2018.2.871

  • UP-9774 Fix tooltip text of inspection markers.
  • EA-131002 Catch and handle exception when there is no available port to listen to third-party authorization token.
  • EA-131138 Check text range more precisely on converting.
  • Get rid of dependency on deprecated class com.intellij.openapi.diff.impl.processing.ByWord.

2018.2.783

  • UP-10120 Fix drawing of avatars when fractional scale factor is set on Windows.
  • EA-129060 Do not show user chooser popup inside write action.
  • UP-10075 Take comment text height into account when resizing the text field.

2018.1.730

  • UP-10081 Preserve comment when an error occurs while trying to leave a comment in the editor.
  • EA-128421 Do not open diff when project is disposed.
  • EA-128811 Iterate over immutable list.

2018.1.701

  • Do not fail when an error occurs during JavaFX initialization.

2018.1.653

  • UP-9873 Fix layout of "Leave a Comment" popup.
  • UP-9440 Do not fully shrink comment input field on "Leave a Comment" popup.

2018.1.629

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget
  • UP-10058 Add mnemonic Alt-V to "Review with Upsource" checkbox in commit dialog.
  • UP-10022 Do not hide connection errors.
  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.

  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.

idea-plugin.description:

Note: If you want to have access to the most recent bug fixes and features of the plugin, you can install it from the alpha channel. To do so please add the following custom plugin repository: https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugins/alpha/7431
idea-plugin.change-notes:
• UP-10577 Make compatible with Android Studio 4.0.

2019.1.1571

  • UP-10575 Make lower since-version for IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1560

  • UP-10562 Change "Accept changes" and "Raise concern" icons to correspond web interface ones.
  • UP-10552 Make "Pick a reaction" icon paler.

2019.1.1554

  • UP-8903 Show tooltip for "Message" column in review details.

2019.1.1537

  • UP-10510 Extract Java-specific part into optional plugin descriptor for IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1518

  • UP-10511 Remove usages of deprecated methods of com.intellij.util.containers.ContainerUtil.
  • UP-10506 Do not shorten names in feed.

2019.1.1506

  • Add compatibility with IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1501

  • UP-10484 Use different icons for "Show Diff" and "Compare with Local" actions.
  • EA-212321 Do not check if notification viewed when project is disposed.

2019.1.1473

  • UP-10461 Fix NoSuchMethodException while view local changes in unified diff.

2019.1.1467

  • EA-210139 Do not request application service com.intellij.ui.EditorTextFieldProvider as project service.
  • EA-137287 Do not commit discussions when project is disposed.
  • EA-142693 Do not update comment editor when project is disposed.
  • EA-209888 Do not register initializing routine when project is disposed.

2019.1.1437

  • Drop compatibility with IDEA 2017.*.
  • UP-10405 Add ability to not suggest review while commit.

2019.1.1423

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • UP-10391 Fix painting for file comments.

2019.1.1386

  • Remove usages of deprecated com.intellij.openapi.vcs.changes.ui.CommitChangeListDialog.getAffectedVcses.
  • Add plugin icon for IDEA 2019.1+.

2019.1.1362

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • EA-140913 Do not navigate to local file when text range is wrong.
  • UP-10346 Remove usages of deprecated VCS log filters constructors.

2019.1.1238

  • UP-10288 Add ability to open revision in Upsource from annotation's context menu.

2019.1.1226

  • UP-10299 Limit threads count from application pool that might be used.

2019.1.1194

  • EA-133845 Fix painting avatars for IDEA 2017.3.
  • Use SVG emoji icons for IDEA 2018.2+.
  • EA-133613 Fix NPE while navigate to Git log.

2019.1.1182

  • UP-9743 Provide links to review and revision in discussion header in feed when it is possible.
  • UP-10260 Add support for JBR11.
  • Fix rendering of build status column for IDEA 2019.1.

2018.2.1164

  • UP-9831 Use Platform UI to show revision details.

2018.2.1145

  • EA-133270 Do not schedule update of progress icon in feed when alarm is disposed.
  • UP-10205 Fix notification popup size.

2018.2.984

  • UP-9792 Bundle series of newly commented-out lines as one change in diff viewer.
  • EA-132803 Do not update discussions UI inside write action.
  • Add separators around modification actions in context menu of Reviews list.

2018.2.871

  • UP-9774 Fix tooltip text of inspection markers.
  • EA-131002 Catch and handle exception when there is no available port to listen to third-party authorization token.
  • EA-131138 Check text range more precisely on converting.
  • Get rid of dependency on deprecated class com.intellij.openapi.diff.impl.processing.ByWord.

2018.2.783

  • UP-10120 Fix drawing of avatars when fractional scale factor is set on Windows.
  • EA-129060 Do not show user chooser popup inside write action.
  • UP-10075 Take comment text height into account when resizing the text field.

2018.1.730

  • UP-10081 Preserve comment when an error occurs while trying to leave a comment in the editor.
  • EA-128421 Do not open diff when project is disposed.
  • EA-128811 Iterate over immutable list.

2018.1.701

  • Do not fail when an error occurs during JavaFX initialization.

2018.1.653

  • UP-9873 Fix layout of "Leave a Comment" popup.
  • UP-9440 Do not fully shrink comment input field on "Leave a Comment" popup.

2018.1.629

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget
  • UP-10058 Add mnemonic Alt-V to "Review with Upsource" checkbox in commit dialog.
  • UP-10022 Do not hide connection errors.
  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.

  • EA-140913 Do not navigate to local file when text range is wrong.
  • UP-10346 Remove usages of deprecated VCS log filters constructors.

2019.1.1238

  • UP-10288 Add ability to open revision in Upsource from annotation's context menu.

2019.1.1226

  • UP-10299 Limit threads count from application pool that might be used.

2019.1.1194

  • EA-133845 Fix painting avatars for IDEA 2017.3.
  • Use SVG emoji icons for IDEA 2018.2+.
  • EA-133613 Fix NPE while navigate to Git log.

2019.1.1182

  • UP-9743 Provide links to review and revision in discussion header in feed when it is possible.
  • UP-10260 Add support for JBR11.
  • Fix rendering of build status column for IDEA 2019.1.

2018.2.1164

  • UP-9831 Use Platform UI to show revision details.

2018.2.1145

  • EA-133270 Do not schedule update of progress icon in feed when alarm is disposed.
  • UP-10205 Fix notification popup size.

2018.2.984

  • UP-9792 Bundle series of newly commented-out lines as one change in diff viewer.
  • EA-132803 Do not update discussions UI inside write action.
  • Add separators around modification actions in context menu of Reviews list.

2018.2.871

  • UP-9774 Fix tooltip text of inspection markers.
  • EA-131002 Catch and handle exception when there is no available port to listen to third-party authorization token.
  • EA-131138 Check text range more precisely on converting.
  • Get rid of dependency on deprecated class com.intellij.openapi.diff.impl.processing.ByWord.

2018.2.783

  • UP-10120 Fix drawing of avatars when fractional scale factor is set on Windows.
  • EA-129060 Do not show user chooser popup inside write action.
  • UP-10075 Take comment text height into account when resizing the text field.

2018.1.730

  • UP-10081 Preserve comment when an error occurs while trying to leave a comment in the editor.
  • EA-128421 Do not open diff when project is disposed.
  • EA-128811 Iterate over immutable list.

2018.1.701

  • Do not fail when an error occurs during JavaFX initialization.

2018.1.653

  • UP-9873 Fix layout of "Leave a Comment" popup.
  • UP-9440 Do not fully shrink comment input field on "Leave a Comment" popup.

2018.1.629

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget
  • UP-10058 Add mnemonic Alt-V to "Review with Upsource" checkbox in commit dialog.
  • UP-10022 Do not hide connection errors.
  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.

• UP-8903 Show tooltip for "Message" column in review details.

2019.1.1537

  • UP-10510 Extract Java-specific part into optional plugin descriptor for IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1518

  • UP-10511 Remove usages of deprecated methods of com.intellij.util.containers.ContainerUtil.
  • UP-10506 Do not shorten names in feed.

2019.1.1506

  • Add compatibility with IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1501

  • UP-10484 Use different icons for "Show Diff" and "Compare with Local" actions.
  • EA-212321 Do not check if notification viewed when project is disposed.

2019.1.1473

  • UP-10461 Fix NoSuchMethodException while view local changes in unified diff.

2019.1.1467

  • EA-210139 Do not request application service com.intellij.ui.EditorTextFieldProvider as project service.
  • EA-137287 Do not commit discussions when project is disposed.
  • EA-142693 Do not update comment editor when project is disposed.
  • EA-209888 Do not register initializing routine when project is disposed.

2019.1.1437

  • Drop compatibility with IDEA 2017.*.
  • UP-10405 Add ability to not suggest review while commit.

2019.1.1423

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • UP-10391 Fix painting for file comments.

2019.1.1386

  • Remove usages of deprecated com.intellij.openapi.vcs.changes.ui.CommitChangeListDialog.getAffectedVcses.
  • Add plugin icon for IDEA 2019.1+.

2019.1.1362

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • EA-140913 Do not navigate to local file when text range is wrong.
  • UP-10346 Remove usages of deprecated VCS log filters constructors.

2019.1.1238

  • UP-10288 Add ability to open revision in Upsource from annotation's context menu.

2019.1.1226

  • UP-10299 Limit threads count from application pool that might be used.

2019.1.1194

  • EA-133845 Fix painting avatars for IDEA 2017.3.
  • Use SVG emoji icons for IDEA 2018.2+.
  • EA-133613 Fix NPE while navigate to Git log.

2019.1.1182

  • UP-9743 Provide links to review and revision in discussion header in feed when it is possible.
  • UP-10260 Add support for JBR11.
  • Fix rendering of build status column for IDEA 2019.1.

2018.2.1164

  • UP-9831 Use Platform UI to show revision details.

2018.2.1145

  • EA-133270 Do not schedule update of progress icon in feed when alarm is disposed.
  • UP-10205 Fix notification popup size.

2018.2.984

  • UP-9792 Bundle series of newly commented-out lines as one change in diff viewer.
  • EA-132803 Do not update discussions UI inside write action.
  • Add separators around modification actions in context menu of Reviews list.

2018.2.871

  • UP-9774 Fix tooltip text of inspection markers.
  • EA-131002 Catch and handle exception when there is no available port to listen to third-party authorization token.
  • EA-131138 Check text range more precisely on converting.
  • Get rid of dependency on deprecated class com.intellij.openapi.diff.impl.processing.ByWord.

2018.2.783

  • UP-10120 Fix drawing of avatars when fractional scale factor is set on Windows.
  • EA-129060 Do not show user chooser popup inside write action.
  • UP-10075 Take comment text height into account when resizing the text field.

2018.1.730

  • UP-10081 Preserve comment when an error occurs while trying to leave a comment in the editor.
  • EA-128421 Do not open diff when project is disposed.
  • EA-128811 Iterate over immutable list.

2018.1.701

  • Do not fail when an error occurs during JavaFX initialization.

2018.1.653

  • UP-9873 Fix layout of "Leave a Comment" popup.
  • UP-9440 Do not fully shrink comment input field on "Leave a Comment" popup.

2018.1.629

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget
  • UP-10058 Add mnemonic Alt-V to "Review with Upsource" checkbox in commit dialog.
  • UP-10022 Do not hide connection errors.
  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.

  • UP-10022 Do not hide connection errors.
  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.

idea-plugin.change-notes:
• UP-10510 Extract Java-specific part into optional plugin descriptor for IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1518

  • UP-10511 Remove usages of deprecated methods of com.intellij.util.containers.ContainerUtil.
  • UP-10506 Do not shorten names in feed.

2019.1.1506

  • Add compatibility with IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1501

  • UP-10484 Use different icons for "Show Diff" and "Compare with Local" actions.
  • EA-212321 Do not check if notification viewed when project is disposed.

2019.1.1473

  • UP-10461 Fix NoSuchMethodException while view local changes in unified diff.

2019.1.1467

  • EA-210139 Do not request application service com.intellij.ui.EditorTextFieldProvider as project service.
  • EA-137287 Do not commit discussions when project is disposed.
  • EA-142693 Do not update comment editor when project is disposed.
  • EA-209888 Do not register initializing routine when project is disposed.

2019.1.1437

  • Drop compatibility with IDEA 2017.*.
  • UP-10405 Add ability to not suggest review while commit.

2019.1.1423

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • UP-10391 Fix painting for file comments.

2019.1.1386

  • Remove usages of deprecated com.intellij.openapi.vcs.changes.ui.CommitChangeListDialog.getAffectedVcses.
  • Add plugin icon for IDEA 2019.1+.

2019.1.1362

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • EA-140913 Do not navigate to local file when text range is wrong.
  • UP-10346 Remove usages of deprecated VCS log filters constructors.

2019.1.1238

  • UP-10288 Add ability to open revision in Upsource from annotation's context menu.

2019.1.1226

  • UP-10299 Limit threads count from application pool that might be used.

2019.1.1194

  • EA-133845 Fix painting avatars for IDEA 2017.3.
  • Use SVG emoji icons for IDEA 2018.2+.
  • EA-133613 Fix NPE while navigate to Git log.

2019.1.1182

  • UP-9743 Provide links to review and revision in discussion header in feed when it is possible.
  • UP-10260 Add support for JBR11.
  • Fix rendering of build status column for IDEA 2019.1.

2018.2.1164

  • UP-9831 Use Platform UI to show revision details.

2018.2.1145

  • EA-133270 Do not schedule update of progress icon in feed when alarm is disposed.
  • UP-10205 Fix notification popup size.

2018.2.984

  • UP-9792 Bundle series of newly commented-out lines as one change in diff viewer.
  • EA-132803 Do not update discussions UI inside write action.
  • Add separators around modification actions in context menu of Reviews list.

2018.2.871

  • UP-9774 Fix tooltip text of inspection markers.
  • EA-131002 Catch and handle exception when there is no available port to listen to third-party authorization token.
  • EA-131138 Check text range more precisely on converting.
  • Get rid of dependency on deprecated class com.intellij.openapi.diff.impl.processing.ByWord.

2018.2.783

  • UP-10120 Fix drawing of avatars when fractional scale factor is set on Windows.
  • EA-129060 Do not show user chooser popup inside write action.
  • UP-10075 Take comment text height into account when resizing the text field.

2018.1.730

  • UP-10081 Preserve comment when an error occurs while trying to leave a comment in the editor.
  • EA-128421 Do not open diff when project is disposed.
  • EA-128811 Iterate over immutable list.

2018.1.701

  • Do not fail when an error occurs during JavaFX initialization.

2018.1.653

  • UP-9873 Fix layout of "Leave a Comment" popup.
  • UP-9440 Do not fully shrink comment input field on "Leave a Comment" popup.

2018.1.629

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget

  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.

idea-plugin.change-notes:
• UP-10511 Remove usages of deprecated methods of com.intellij.util.containers.ContainerUtil.
  • UP-10506 Do not shorten names in feed.

2019.1.1506

  • Add compatibility with IDEA 2019.3+.

2019.1.1501

  • UP-10484 Use different icons for "Show Diff" and "Compare with Local" actions.
  • EA-212321 Do not check if notification viewed when project is disposed.

2019.1.1473

  • UP-10461 Fix NoSuchMethodException while view local changes in unified diff.

2019.1.1467

  • EA-210139 Do not request application service com.intellij.ui.EditorTextFieldProvider as project service.
  • EA-137287 Do not commit discussions when project is disposed.
  • EA-142693 Do not update comment editor when project is disposed.
  • EA-209888 Do not register initializing routine when project is disposed.

2019.1.1437

  • Drop compatibility with IDEA 2017.*.
  • UP-10405 Add ability to not suggest review while commit.

2019.1.1423

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • UP-10391 Fix painting for file comments.

2019.1.1386

  • Remove usages of deprecated com.intellij.openapi.vcs.changes.ui.CommitChangeListDialog.getAffectedVcses.
  • Add plugin icon for IDEA 2019.1+.

2019.1.1362

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • EA-140913 Do not navigate to local file when text range is wrong.
  • UP-10346 Remove usages of deprecated VCS log filters constructors.

2019.1.1238

  • UP-10288 Add ability to open revision in Upsource from annotation's context menu.

2019.1.1226

  • UP-10299 Limit threads count from application pool that might be used.

2019.1.1194

  • EA-133845 Fix painting avatars for IDEA 2017.3.
  • Use SVG emoji icons for IDEA 2018.2+.
  • EA-133613 Fix NPE while navigate to Git log.

2019.1.1182

  • UP-9743 Provide links to review and revision in discussion header in feed when it is possible.
  • UP-10260 Add support for JBR11.
  • Fix rendering of build status column for IDEA 2019.1.

2018.2.1164

  • UP-9831 Use Platform UI to show revision details.

2018.2.1145

  • EA-133270 Do not schedule update of progress icon in feed when alarm is disposed.
  • UP-10205 Fix notification popup size.

2018.2.984

  • UP-9792 Bundle series of newly commented-out lines as one change in diff viewer.
  • EA-132803 Do not update discussions UI inside write action.
  • Add separators around modification actions in context menu of Reviews list.

2018.2.871

  • UP-9774 Fix tooltip text of inspection markers.
  • EA-131002 Catch and handle exception when there is no available port to listen to third-party authorization token.
  • EA-131138 Check text range more precisely on converting.
  • Get rid of dependency on deprecated class com.intellij.openapi.diff.impl.processing.ByWord.

2018.2.783

  • UP-10120 Fix drawing of avatars when fractional scale factor is set on Windows.
  • EA-129060 Do not show user chooser popup inside write action.
  • UP-10075 Take comment text height into account when resizing the text field.

2018.1.730

  • UP-10081 Preserve comment when an error occurs while trying to leave a comment in the editor.
  • EA-128421 Do not open diff when project is disposed.
  • EA-128811 Iterate over immutable list.

2018.1.701

  • Do not fail when an error occurs during JavaFX initialization.

2018.1.653

  • UP-9873 Fix layout of "Leave a Comment" popup.
  • UP-9440 Do not fully shrink comment input field on "Leave a Comment" popup.

2018.1.629

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget

  • EA-210139 Do not request application service com.intellij.ui.EditorTextFieldProvider as project service.
  • EA-137287 Do not commit discussions when project is disposed.
  • EA-142693 Do not update comment editor when project is disposed.
  • EA-209888 Do not register initializing routine when project is disposed.

2019.1.1437

  • Drop compatibility with IDEA 2017.*.
  • UP-10405 Add ability to not suggest review while commit.

2019.1.1423

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • UP-10391 Fix painting for file comments.

2019.1.1386

  • Remove usages of deprecated com.intellij.openapi.vcs.changes.ui.CommitChangeListDialog.getAffectedVcses.
  • Add plugin icon for IDEA 2019.1+.

2019.1.1362

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • EA-140913 Do not navigate to local file when text range is wrong.
  • UP-10346 Remove usages of deprecated VCS log filters constructors.

2019.1.1238

  • UP-10288 Add ability to open revision in Upsource from annotation's context menu.

2019.1.1226

  • UP-10299 Limit threads count from application pool that might be used.

2019.1.1194

  • EA-133845 Fix painting avatars for IDEA 2017.3.
  • Use SVG emoji icons for IDEA 2018.2+.
  • EA-133613 Fix NPE while navigate to Git log.

2019.1.1182

  • UP-9743 Provide links to review and revision in discussion header in feed when it is possible.
  • UP-10260 Add support for JBR11.
  • Fix rendering of build status column for IDEA 2019.1.

2018.2.1164

  • UP-9831 Use Platform UI to show revision details.

2018.2.1145

  • EA-133270 Do not schedule update of progress icon in feed when alarm is disposed.
  • UP-10205 Fix notification popup size.

2018.2.984

  • UP-9792 Bundle series of newly commented-out lines as one change in diff viewer.
  • EA-132803 Do not update discussions UI inside write action.
  • Add separators around modification actions in context menu of Reviews list.

2018.2.871

  • UP-9774 Fix tooltip text of inspection markers.
  • EA-131002 Catch and handle exception when there is no available port to listen to third-party authorization token.
  • EA-131138 Check text range more precisely on converting.
  • Get rid of dependency on deprecated class com.intellij.openapi.diff.impl.processing.ByWord.

2018.2.783

  • UP-10120 Fix drawing of avatars when fractional scale factor is set on Windows.
  • EA-129060 Do not show user chooser popup inside write action.
  • UP-10075 Take comment text height into account when resizing the text field.

2018.1.730

  • UP-10081 Preserve comment when an error occurs while trying to leave a comment in the editor.
  • EA-128421 Do not open diff when project is disposed.
  • EA-128811 Iterate over immutable list.

2018.1.701

  • Do not fail when an error occurs during JavaFX initialization.

2018.1.653

  • UP-9873 Fix layout of "Leave a Comment" popup.
  • UP-9440 Do not fully shrink comment input field on "Leave a Comment" popup.

2018.1.629

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget
  • UP-10058 Add mnemonic Alt-V to "Review with Upsource" checkbox in commit dialog.
  • UP-10022 Do not hide connection errors.
  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.

  • UP-9774 Fix tooltip text of inspection markers.
  • EA-131002 Catch and handle exception when there is no available port to listen to third-party authorization token.
  • EA-131138 Check text range more precisely on converting.
  • Get rid of dependency on deprecated class com.intellij.openapi.diff.impl.processing.ByWord.

2018.2.783

  • UP-10120 Fix drawing of avatars when fractional scale factor is set on Windows.
  • EA-129060 Do not show user chooser popup inside write action.
  • UP-10075 Take comment text height into account when resizing the text field.

2018.1.730

  • UP-10081 Preserve comment when an error occurs while trying to leave a comment in the editor.
  • EA-128421 Do not open diff when project is disposed.
  • EA-128811 Iterate over immutable list.

2018.1.701

  • Do not fail when an error occurs during JavaFX initialization.

2018.1.653

  • UP-9873 Fix layout of "Leave a Comment" popup.
  • UP-9440 Do not fully shrink comment input field on "Leave a Comment" popup.

2018.1.629

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget
  • UP-10058 Add mnemonic Alt-V to "Review with Upsource" checkbox in commit dialog.
  • UP-10022 Do not hide connection errors.
  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.

idea-plugin.name: Upsource Integration
idea-plugin.description:
Integration with JetBrains Upsource

Note: If you want to have access to the most recent bug fixes and features of the plugin, you can install it from the alpha channel. To do so please add the following custom plugin repository: https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugins/alpha/7431
idea-plugin.change-notes:
• UP-10461 Fix NoSuchMethodException while view local changes in unified diff.

2019.1.1467

  • EA-210139 Do not request application service com.intellij.ui.EditorTextFieldProvider as project service.
  • EA-137287 Do not commit discussions when project is disposed.
  • EA-142693 Do not update comment editor when project is disposed.
  • EA-209888 Do not register initializing routine when project is disposed.

2019.1.1437

  • Drop compatibility with IDEA 2017.*.
  • UP-10405 Add ability to not suggest review while commit.

2019.1.1423

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • UP-10391 Fix painting for file comments.

2019.1.1386

  • Remove usages of deprecated com.intellij.openapi.vcs.changes.ui.CommitChangeListDialog.getAffectedVcses.
  • Add plugin icon for IDEA 2019.1+.

2019.1.1362

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • EA-140913 Do not navigate to local file when text range is wrong.
  • UP-10346 Remove usages of deprecated VCS log filters constructors.

2019.1.1238

  • UP-10288 Add ability to open revision in Upsource from annotation's context menu.

2019.1.1226

  • UP-10299 Limit threads count from application pool that might be used.

  • UP-9743 Provide links to review and revision in discussion header in feed when it is possible.
  • UP-10260 Add support for JBR11.
  • Fix rendering of build status column for IDEA 2019.1.

2018.2.1164

  • UP-9831 Use Platform UI to show revision details.

2018.2.1145

  • EA-133270 Do not schedule update of progress icon in feed when alarm is disposed.
  • UP-10205 Fix notification popup size.

2018.2.984

  • UP-9792 Bundle series of newly commented-out lines as one change in diff viewer.
  • EA-132803 Do not update discussions UI inside write action.
  • Add separators around modification actions in context menu of Reviews list.

2018.2.871

  • UP-9774 Fix tooltip text of inspection markers.
  • EA-131002 Catch and handle exception when there is no available port to listen to third-party authorization token.
  • EA-131138 Check text range more precisely on converting.
  • Get rid of dependency on deprecated class com.intellij.openapi.diff.impl.processing.ByWord.

2018.2.783

  • UP-10120 Fix drawing of avatars when fractional scale factor is set on Windows.
  • EA-129060 Do not show user chooser popup inside write action.
  • UP-10075 Take comment text height into account when resizing the text field.

2018.1.730

  • UP-10081 Preserve comment when an error occurs while trying to leave a comment in the editor.
  • EA-128421 Do not open diff when project is disposed.
  • EA-128811 Iterate over immutable list.

2018.1.701

  • Do not fail when an error occurs during JavaFX initialization.

2018.1.653

  • UP-9873 Fix layout of "Leave a Comment" popup.
  • UP-9440 Do not fully shrink comment input field on "Leave a Comment" popup.

2018.1.629

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget
  • UP-10058 Add mnemonic Alt-V to "Review with Upsource" checkbox in commit dialog.
  • UP-10022 Do not hide connection errors.
  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.

idea-plugin.name: Upsource Integration
idea-plugin.description:
Integration with JetBrains Upsource

Note: If you want to have access to the most recent bug fixes and features of the plugin, you can install it from the alpha channel. To do so please add the following custom plugin repository: https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugins/alpha/7431
idea-plugin.change-notes:
2019.1.1423

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • UP-10391 Fix painting for file comments.

2019.1.1386

  • Remove usages of deprecated com.intellij.openapi.vcs.changes.ui.CommitChangeListDialog.getAffectedVcses.
  • Add plugin icon for IDEA 2019.1+.

2019.1.1362

  • EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • EA-140913 Do not navigate to local file when text range is wrong.
  • UP-10346 Remove usages of deprecated VCS log filters constructors.

2019.1.1238

  • UP-10288 Add ability to open revision in Upsource from annotation's context menu.

2019.1.1226

  • UP-10299 Limit threads count from application pool that might be used.

2019.1.1194

  • EA-133845 Fix painting avatars for IDEA 2017.3.
  • Use SVG emoji icons for IDEA 2018.2+.
  • EA-133613 Fix NPE while navigate to Git log.

2019.1.1182

  • UP-9743 Provide links to review and revision in discussion header in feed when it is possible.
  • UP-10260 Add support for JBR11.
  • Fix rendering of build status column for IDEA 2019.1.

2018.2.1164

  • UP-9831 Use Platform UI to show revision details.

2018.2.1145

  • EA-133270 Do not schedule update of progress icon in feed when alarm is disposed.
  • UP-10205 Fix notification popup size.

2018.2.984

  • UP-9792 Bundle series of newly commented-out lines as one change in diff viewer.
  • EA-132803 Do not update discussions UI inside write action.
  • Add separators around modification actions in context menu of Reviews list.

2018.2.871

  • UP-9774 Fix tooltip text of inspection markers.
  • EA-131002 Catch and handle exception when there is no available port to listen to third-party authorization token.
  • EA-131138 Check text range more precisely on converting.
  • Get rid of dependency on deprecated class com.intellij.openapi.diff.impl.processing.ByWord.

2018.2.783

  • UP-10120 Fix drawing of avatars when fractional scale factor is set on Windows.
  • EA-129060 Do not show user chooser popup inside write action.
  • UP-10075 Take comment text height into account when resizing the text field.

2018.1.730

  • UP-10081 Preserve comment when an error occurs while trying to leave a comment in the editor.
  • EA-128421 Do not open diff when project is disposed.
  • EA-128811 Iterate over immutable list.

2018.1.701

  • Do not fail when an error occurs during JavaFX initialization.

2018.1.653

  • UP-9873 Fix layout of "Leave a Comment" popup.
  • UP-9440 Do not fully shrink comment input field on "Leave a Comment" popup.

2018.1.629

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget
  • UP-10058 Add mnemonic Alt-V to "Review with Upsource" checkbox in commit dialog.
  • UP-10022 Do not hide connection errors.
  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.

  • EA-128811 Iterate over immutable list.

2018.1.701

  • Do not fail when an error occurs during JavaFX initialization.

2018.1.653

  • UP-9873 Fix layout of "Leave a Comment" popup.
  • UP-9440 Do not fully shrink comment input field on "Leave a Comment" popup.

2018.1.629

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget
  • UP-10058 Add mnemonic Alt-V to "Review with Upsource" checkbox in commit dialog.

  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.

Note: If you want to have access to the most recent bug fixes and features of the plugin, you can install it from the alpha channel. To do so please add the following custom plugin repository: https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugins/alpha/7431
idea-plugin.change-notes:
• EA-140914 Prevent ConcurrentModificationException when uncommitted discussions changed.
  • EA-140913 Do not navigate to local file when text range is wrong.
  • UP-10346 Remove usages of deprecated VCS log filters constructors.

2019.1.1238

  • UP-10288 Add ability to open revision in Upsource from annotation's context menu.

2019.1.1226

  • UP-10299 Limit threads count from application pool that might be used.

2019.1.1194

  • EA-133845 Fix painting avatars for IDEA 2017.3.
  • Use SVG emoji icons for IDEA 2018.2+.
  • EA-133613 Fix NPE while navigate to Git log.

2019.1.1182

  • UP-9743 Provide links to review and revision in discussion header in feed when it is possible.
  • UP-10260 Add support for JBR11.
  • Fix rendering of build status column for IDEA 2019.1.

2018.2.1164

  • UP-9831 Use Platform UI to show revision details.

2018.2.1145

  • EA-133270 Do not schedule update of progress icon in feed when alarm is disposed.
  • UP-10205 Fix notification popup size.

2018.2.984

  • UP-9792 Bundle series of newly commented-out lines as one change in diff viewer.
  • EA-132803 Do not update discussions UI inside write action.
  • Add separators around modification actions in context menu of Reviews list.

2018.2.871

  • UP-9774 Fix tooltip text of inspection markers.
  • EA-131002 Catch and handle exception when there is no available port to listen to third-party authorization token.
  • EA-131138 Check text range more precisely on converting.
  • Get rid of dependency on deprecated class com.intellij.openapi.diff.impl.processing.ByWord.

2018.2.783

  • UP-10120 Fix drawing of avatars when fractional scale factor is set on Windows.
  • EA-129060 Do not show user chooser popup inside write action.
  • UP-10075 Take comment text height into account when resizing the text field.

2018.1.730

  • UP-10081 Preserve comment when an error occurs while trying to leave a comment in the editor.
  • EA-128421 Do not open diff when project is disposed.
  • EA-128811 Iterate over immutable list.

2018.1.701

  • Do not fail when an error occurs during JavaFX initialization.

2018.1.653

  • UP-9873 Fix layout of "Leave a Comment" popup.
  • UP-9440 Do not fully shrink comment input field on "Leave a Comment" popup.

2018.1.629

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget
  • UP-10058 Add mnemonic Alt-V to "Review with Upsource" checkbox in commit dialog.
  • UP-10022 Do not hide connection errors.
  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.

  • EA-131002 Catch and handle exception when there is no available port to listen to third-party authorization token.
  • EA-131138 Check text range more precisely on converting.
  • Get rid of dependency on deprecated class com.intellij.openapi.diff.impl.processing.ByWord.

2018.2.783

  • UP-10120 Fix drawing of avatars when fractional scale factor is set on Windows.
  • EA-129060 Do not show user chooser popup inside write action.
  • UP-10075 Take comment text height into account when resizing the text field.

2018.1.730

  • UP-10081 Preserve comment when an error occurs while trying to leave a comment in the editor.
  • EA-128421 Do not open diff when project is disposed.
  • EA-128811 Iterate over immutable list.

2018.1.701

  • Do not fail when an error occurs during JavaFX initialization.

2018.1.653

  • UP-9873 Fix layout of "Leave a Comment" popup.
  • UP-9440 Do not fully shrink comment input field on "Leave a Comment" popup.

2018.1.629

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget
  • UP-10058 Add mnemonic Alt-V to "Review with Upsource" checkbox in commit dialog.
  • UP-10022 Do not hide connection errors.
  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.

  • EA-132803 Do not update discussions UI inside write action.
  • Add separators around modification actions in context menu of Reviews list.

2018.2.871

  • UP-9774 Fix tooltip text of inspection markers.
  • EA-131002 Catch and handle exception when there is no available port to listen to third-party authorization token.
  • EA-131138 Check text range more precisely on converting.
  • Get rid of dependency on deprecated class com.intellij.openapi.diff.impl.processing.ByWord.

2018.2.783

  • UP-10120 Fix drawing of avatars when fractional scale factor is set on Windows.
  • EA-129060 Do not show user chooser popup inside write action.
  • UP-10075 Take comment text height into account when resizing the text field.

2018.1.730

  • UP-10081 Preserve comment when an error occurs while trying to leave a comment in the editor.
  • EA-128421 Do not open diff when project is disposed.
  • EA-128811 Iterate over immutable list.

2018.1.701

  • Do not fail when an error occurs during JavaFX initialization.

2018.1.653

  • UP-9873 Fix layout of "Leave a Comment" popup.
  • UP-9440 Do not fully shrink comment input field on "Leave a Comment" popup.

2018.1.629

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget
  • UP-10058 Add mnemonic Alt-V to "Review with Upsource" checkbox in commit dialog.
  • UP-10022 Do not hide connection errors.
  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.

idea-plugin.name: Upsource Integration
idea-plugin.description:
Integration with JetBrains Upsource

Note: If you want to have access to the most recent bug fixes and features of the plugin, you can install it from the alpha channel. To do so please add the following custom plugin repository: https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugins/alpha/7431
idea-plugin.change-notes:
• UP-10081 Preserve comment when an error occurred while trying to leave a comment in editor.
  • EA-128421 Do not open diff when project is disposed.
  • EA-128811 Iterate over immutable list.

2018.1.701

  • Do not fail when an error occurs during JavaFX initialization.

2018.1.653

  • UP-9873 Fix layout of "Leave a Comment" popup.
  • UP-9440 Do not fully shrink comment input field on "Leave a Comment" popup.

2018.1.629

  • EA-127308 Fix NPE in IdeNotificationsManager.getWidget
  • UP-10058 Add mnemonic Alt-V to "Review with Upsource" checkbox in commit dialog.
  • UP-10022 Do not hide connection errors.
  • UP-8734 Make initial width of "Leave a Comment" popup bigger.

2018.1.622

  • UP-10036 Add ability to copy branch name and open branch in Upsource. Needs to be connected to Upsource 2018.1.621 or later to open branch.
  • UP-9106 Add ability to close/reopen review right from Reviews list.
